90b2: kyis bltar mi mthong / bdud kyi tsher ma thams cad ni dkrugs/ de kho na nyid mkhyen pa nyid ni rim par thugs su chud / spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog
90b3: dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni ldan/ bdud dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad ni bcom/
90b4: brjod pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni sgrog/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag
90b5: tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha
90b6: rol tu phyin pa dang / dka' ba spyad pas mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku brgyan pas ni mdzes shing / rin po che rdo rje'i
90b7: pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khril ni bzhugs te/ gdan rin po che dang / rdo rje'i pad+ma'i seng ge'i khri ri rab tsam rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma

91a1: sil sil sgra 'byung ba/ rdo rje dang rin po che ngu ba'i stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brten pa/ rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i tshubyin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i 'phreng ba
91a2: dang ldan pa'i snam rten dang bcas pa/ rin po che du ma'i pad+ma'i stong po la chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las du ma'i 'od
91a3: zer 'bar bas sdang bar gyur pas kun tu mdzes pa/ rin po che dang rdo rje'i thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bskyabs pa/
91a4: dpag bsam gyi shing du mas mdzes par byas pa rgya che ba la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byor pas sa phyogs mdzes
91a5: par gyur pa/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten kun gyis mthong na dga' ba/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis yang dag par rgyas par chos ston te tshangs par spyod
91a6: pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba yang dag par
91a7: ston to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des

91b1: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas gsal bar byas par gyur to/ / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des
91b2: gsal bar gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang seng ge'i khri du ma bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang rnams na chos
91b3: ston to/ / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang thabs cig go// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang /
91b4: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go// de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje'i lhun po
91b5: chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ / de dag thams cad kyang kun tu snang ngo // skad cig de la sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyis
91b6: tshim par gyur to/ / 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos so// long ba rnams ni mig thob bo// smyon pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed do// nad pa rnams ni sos par gyur to// sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas
91b7: so/ / sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni med par gyur to// yud tsam de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyi ming

92a1: yang mi grag par gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi bar gang dag mun pa mun nag dang / mun pa mun nag chen por 'dug pa de dag thams cad kyang gsal bar snang bar gyur to//
92a2: der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad dang / sems can gzhan 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig shes so// de nas sems can de dag thams cad kyis ngo mtshar rmad du
92a3: byung ba'i chos kyi dga' ba thob ste bde ba mchog gis tshim par gyur nas kun tu bltas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ste/ de dag gis
92a4: gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de mthong nas de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo / / skyabs su dong ma thag tu de dag thams cad de bzhin
92a5: gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bdag son pa snyam du shes so/ / snang ba des bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce
92a6: gcig tu gyur par kun tu snang ngo / / bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i sgrar ngu zhing skrag nas byer ro// bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po rnyi n+ti bor gyur cing lus rdul nas bdu/
92a7: kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang / dge sbyong go'u ta/

92b1: ma ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na chos bstan pa 'dil ltos/ des bdag cag phung ngo // mtho btsams so// phyogs gang na gnas su gtol med do// longs la dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i gan du
92b2: dong ste bdud kyi yul 'di thal bar byas par ma gyur kyi bar du gzhom mo/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud kyi ros kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis rje bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas
92b3: rang rang gi gnas su dong ste/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs can/ lus la go cha sna tshogs pa/ cha byad dang rgyan sna tshogs can/ mche ba mi bzad par 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhin mi sdug par
92b4: bsgyur ba/ mig dang / bzhin dang / skra kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar pa dag skad cig de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas/ bdud sdig can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad
92b5: ces smras so/ / bzhengs bzhengs thog mar bzhud la ji tsam du dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de tsa nas kyang phyis bdag cag gi yul du gnod pa
92b6: cung zad kyang mi skyed pa dang / bdag cag gi yul gnod par mi 'gyur bar deng nyid du phye mar brlag go// rnam par gzhom mo// de nas bdud sdig can dga' zhing mgu ste shin tu dga' bas
92b7: spu'i khung bu khyab nas skad cig de nyid la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / bdud kyi sde chen pos par snang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad

93a1: cu rtsa bzhir khyab par byas te/ dung dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / lcags kyi sil khrol dang / rnga bo che rdung zhing hu hu zhes bya ba dang /
93a2: bi tsi zhes bya ba dang / zung zhig zung zhig/ sod cig sod cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing gshol dang / gtun shing dang / gtun rked nyag dang / phur bu dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mda' bo che
93a3: dang / mdung thung dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang / mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha lag na thogs shing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste skad cig de nyid
93a4: la a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshon cha thams cad kyi char phab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus mtshon cha de dag thams cad me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin chen por gyur par
93a5: snang ngo / / bdud kyi sgra de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / yang dag par 'gro ba'i sgra rnams su grag go// bdud sdig can ni zhags pa lnga'i
93a6: bcings pas bdag nyid bcings par mthong ngo / / de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ngo mtshar chen po de mthong nas ngo mtshar du
93a7: gyur cing dga' ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo // bdud sdig can ni bdag nyid dgrol bar 'dod na 'grol ma nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su

93b1: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'gyel to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byams pa chen po'i thugs dang / thugs rje chen
93b2: bopos brlan pa'i spyan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams thams cad du gzigs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i
93b3: bdag po lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'di 'khor gyi khyams 'di nas slong la stan la zhog ste/ rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs bsam
93b4: gyis mi khyab par bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba gang gis bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'di dag dang / bdud sdig can 'di sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'dong pa dang / gzhan
93b5: yang gang dag sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po dang / gdon dang / nam mkha' 'gro ma dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang /
93b6: gnon po dang / zas su btsas pa za ba la sogs pa sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma gus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
93b7: ba'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa de dag thams cad gang gis 'dzud pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar byed pa'ang ston cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i

94a1: phyir ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan las langs te bla gos
94a2: phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul
94a3: dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / sems can kun gyi nyon mongs pa// gzhig pa'i slad du 'dren par byung // khyod ni bdud rnams kun las rgyal// 'jig
94a4: rten rtsa lag gcig pu khyod/ / thar pa'i grong khyer 'jug pa'i lam/ ye shes ma lus khyod gcig pus// yang dag brnyes nas thugs rje yis// snyan pa'i gsung gis bstan pa mdzad//
94a5: khyod sngon sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang // shes rab la sogs yon tan gyis// bdag mdzad slad kyis sems can btsud// khyod kyis chos rnams
94a6: skye med par/ / bshad cing de bzhin rnam phye yang // 'bras bur dogs pa ma mchis pa// kye ma mgon po khyod kyis bshad// 'khor lo yan lag bcu gnyis pa// khyod nyid mkhyen nas rab tu
94a7: bskor/ / mu stegs can dang bdud btul te// chos kyi snang ba gsal bar mdzad// nyon mongs brag chen rnam kun tu// ye shes rdo rjes rab bcom nas// sus kyang thob par ma gyur pa'i

94b1: byang chub bla na med pa brnyes/ / gang gis mtshan yang rdzogs pa yi// byang chub sa bon nyid 'gyur ba// khyod ni 'jig rten mchog gcig pu// dam pa rab sbyin bdag po lags// khyod ni mgon po
94b2: khyod ni pha/ / khyod skyabs khyod ni dpung gnyen lags// thugs rje chen po ye shes nyid// mya ngan 'das nas gcig pu khyod// khyod nyid gshegs nas sems can rnams// sems can dmyal
94b3: las rnam par dgrol/ / rang gi sku yang yongs btang nas// khyod kyis srog chags rnams kyang bsrungs// lus can kun gyis ma thob pa'i// ye shes khyod kyis brnyes gyur nas// grol
94b4: te 'jig rten rnams kyang grol/ / kye ma khyod ni rtsa lag bzang // mgon po khyod kyi 'od zer gyi// dra bas 'jig rten khams khyab ste// mya ngan 'das las lhag pa bde// lus can kun
94b5: gyis thob par mdzad/ / khyod kyi 'od kyi gzis bcom pas// gza' rnams kun dang dgung zla dang / gdugs rnams dang ni zhugs rnams dang // nor bu lam mer ma gyur to// de nas
94b6: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas kyang rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das
94b7: legs so zhes gsol nas rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag

95a1: p o lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu
95a2: de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos te/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs
95a3: dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ steng mthon 'og dma'/ 'og mtho na steng dma' bar gyur to// phyogs thams cad dang phyogs
95a4: mtshams thams cad kyang dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad
95a5: nas rdo rje kun tu 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ ma lce gcig tu gyur pa dag byung bar kun tu snang ngo // rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
95a6: khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa ji snyed pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge
95a7: ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par ston pa

95b1: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi 'khor gyi khyams rgya che ba dag na kun tu snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin
95b2: gshegs pa de dag gi spyan snga na/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba rgya chen po des snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la so sor zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba rgya chen po kun tu
95b3: gda' ba 'di su'i legs/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ so so'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs
95b4: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab kyi steng na chos ston to/ / bcom ldan 'das des bdud sdig can zhags
95b5: pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel pa gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la 'di skad du/
95b6: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston cig ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge
95b7: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs so// de skad ces bka' stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

96a1: sangs rgyas de dag gis gnang nas/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal te/
96a2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
96a3: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i sprin dang / gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyan 'phreng gi sprin dang / dbu
96a4: rgyan gyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / na bza'i sprin chen pos mchod pa chen po byas nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas
96a5: tepus mo g.yas pa'i lhang rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la logs su lta zhing bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas
96a6: gnang nas rang rang gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan de dag la 'khod par gyur to/ / de'i tshe shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje tog ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
96a7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di

96b1: nyid las brtsams te chos kyang ston to/ / rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas snang bar gyur to// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub
96b2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des ngo mtshar de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
96b3: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba de la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
96b4: thams cad snang bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad cing sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
96b5: gyi sdug bsngal thams cad mi ganga' bar gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa
96b6: 'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul che zhing dbang che bar grags pa thams cad kyang kun nas mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ nub phyogs su mchi bar gda' ba 'ang su'i lags/
96b7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di

97a1: skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi logs na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
97a2: shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to// bcom ldan
97a3: 'das des spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po phyung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des 'jig rten gyi khams der bdud sdig can bskul ma thag tu kun tu khros nas lha'i bu
97a4: thams cad dang / gzhan yang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / dpung gi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la gtse ba'i phyir lhags pa dang / de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de
97a5: bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de nyid du zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bcings nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel te/ de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
97a6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la ston cig par bka' lung byin nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje des rdo rjes rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya
97a7: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje rnams bstan te/ 'di ni rdo rje de dag nyid kyi rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu rdo rje

97b1: 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa snang bar byas te/ 'jig
97b2: rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang bskul/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang bskul bas ngo mtshar
97b3: thob par gyur pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang so sor zhus so// rigs kyi bu de nyid kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
97b4: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i spyan snga na 'dug cing bsnyen bkur byed pa'ang mthong ngo / / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
97b5: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
97b6: ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur
97b7: bgyi ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje de'ang blta bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

98a1: rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab
98a2: par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
98a3: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas
98a4: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig/
98a5: rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang lhan cig smra ba na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa las grub pas byin
98a6: pa'i rin po che de dag las 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang sngon dang / ljang ser dang / bcod ka dang / shel dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang /
98a7: mu tig dang / gser dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / rdo'i snying po dang / ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las dang / go mu ta ra ga dang / mu tig

98b1: dmar po'i kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang khyab par byas nas/ lha'i
98b2: snang bas snang bar byas te 'dus nas 'ja' lta bur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs mtshan thams cad
98b3: phun sum tshogs pa/ 'jam pa/ mnyen pa/ rab tu gzhon pa/ sha rgyas pa/ snum pa/ long bu gnyis kyi rtsa mi mngon pa/ pad+ma gsar du kha bye ba lta bu/ dung dang / nya dang /
98b4: rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu dang / pad+ma dang / chu srin ma ka ra'i mtshan dang ldan pa gnyis la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas nub par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil
98b5: na'od zer re re'i rtse mo las pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu tshang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba'ang lta ste/ gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dang
98b6: an da rnyil dang / dngul dang / b+hu ru dang / shel dang / ke ke ru dang / dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dga'athon to// de las gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni an da rnyil gyi
98b7: rgyu las byung ba dag go/ / snying po ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o//

99a1: a nad rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying po ni byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni
99a2: ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ / ze'u 'bru ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying po ni shel gyi rgyu las byung
99a3: ba'o/ / thi ba na~M ki ki r+m+ma m+b+halas byung ba'o// rtsub ni dun las kyi sgyulas byung ba'o// ze'u 'gyu gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// bla n+ya'i rgya las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dabs ni shes
99a4: las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o//
99a5: shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma no ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// snying po ni dun las kyi rgya las byung ba'o// ze ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// rgyab ni a nang rnyil gyirgyu
99a6: las byung ba'o/ / ze'u 'bru ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o//
99a7: ze ba ni anangad rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni gser gyi rgyu las

99b1: byung ba dag go/ / snying po ni am da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// de bzhin
99b2: du sbyar te/ de ltar rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma dag go// rin po che'i pad+ma re re la'ang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu mdzes
99b3: pa'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' re re'i lte ba nas kyang 'od zer 'bum 'bum byung ngo // 'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang
99b4: rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i zla bas spras pa'i khang bran gyi rtse mo la
99b5: seng ge'i rna ba'i steng na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan sbyangs pas nam mkha' kun tu khebs pa/ pad+ma rA ga dang / an da rnyil dang / mar gang dang /
99b6: bai DUrma dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / ke ke ru las byas pa'i ka ba chen po'i klad la 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi shing las gcod pa lta bu'i tshogs bkod pas rnam par spras te mdzes
99b7: par byas pa/ dngul las byas pa'i phug ron gyi 'phreng gi mtha' mu tig dmar po dang ldan pa'i dril bu ga yar ka'i dra ba sbyangs pa'i sgras sad par gyur na/ rab tu dga' zhing dregs pa'i phug

100a1: ron dang / bya bar dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / rma bya'i nga ro dag gis nyams dga' ba/ khyams dang 'dun khang chen po'i nyen kor stegs bus bskor bas
100a2: mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i sgo khang can/ shel gyi rgyu las byas pa'i stegs bu dang ldan pa/ bkra shis kyi gser gyi bum pa du ma nas spos chu dri zhim
100a3: pos chag chag btab pa/ rdzing chen po 'gram gyi ne'u gsing mar gad kyi rgyu las byung ba/ ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde bas mdzes pa'i phyogs na bde bar nyal ba'i ngang pa dang /
100a4: khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / ka lan ta ka'i khyu gnas pa/ gser gyi phye ma bangal ba'i gtos chen po rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas kyi 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan
100a5: pa'i chus yongs su gang ba grangs 'bum phrad du mas kun nas yongs su bskor ba dag byung ngo / / rdzing bu re re nas kyang rin po che'i pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rtsa dgu byung
100a6: ngongo/ / rin po che'i pad+ma re re'i snying po la'ang sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyi sgra byung bas lha'i bu mo dag glu len gar byed cing yongs su sbyang ngo // sil snyan dang
100a7: pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ba de dag las kyang tshogs su bcud ba 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo // sbyin dang tshul khrims kyis ni gang zhig dpag med cing // de bzhin bzod dang

100b1: brtson 'grus dag gi stobs ldan la/ / bsam gtan gyis ni zhi zhing dbang gyis kun 'byor pa// ye shes sgron ma de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis// bsam gyis mi khyab stobs dang smon
100b2: lam rnams dang ldan/ / thabs dang byang chub yan lag ting 'dzin rnams kyi bdag/ rnam par grol ba'i lam dang stobs bcu ldan pa yi// thub pa gang yin de la mchod phyir 'dong bar gyis//
100b3: 'dam rdzab nas ni pad+ma rgyas pa ji bzhin du// gang zhig nyon mongs 'dam gyis rtag par mi gos pa// tshe dang skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par bsal ba yi// rgyal ba 'jig rten mgon po de la
100b4: blta phyir deng / / gcig kyang mi ldan par gyur pa gang zhig gis// skye dgu rnams kyi gti mug sgo glegs rnams bshig cing // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyod pa rab zhi ba// shAkya'i tog
100b5: ldan de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis/ / de ltar khang pa brtsegs pa dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa rnam pa sna tsho bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nam mkha'i dkyil na kun
100b6: tu snang ste/ kha cig tu ni rin po che'i sprin gyi char 'bab par kun tu snang ngo // kha cig tu ni me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni go shir sha'i tsan dan dang / spos dang / byug pa
100b7: dang / phye ma'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni gos kyi 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni ka shi ka'i ras dang / du ku la'i ras dang / za'ug gi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni dpag bsam

101a1: gyi shing ljon pa'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / ka tsa li nid dang / ma hA kats+ya
101a2: la ni da dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dza sha ka chen po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// me tog gi char de
101a3: dag las dri gang byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa gang dag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rgyas par khyab bo/ / 'jig rten gyi kham
101a4: dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa de dag thams cad dri des mchog tu bde bas tshim zhing sems dga' bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral nas phan tshun 'dri ba dang / 'jig
101a5: rten gyi khams mi mjed de na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / / de dag gis de nas mthong nas kyang phyag 'tshal to//
101a6: skyes bu dam pa de la phyag 'tshal ma thag tu sems can gang dag ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'dod pa de dag kyang mchog tu bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / dad pa thob nas skad cig/
101a7: de nyid la ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las grol te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas par snang la 'khod de/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

101b1: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod nas lan
101b2: 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje 'khor gyi khyams chen po thams cad dang ldan pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas lha rnams par snang las
101b3: babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa dag na lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / pheg rdzob
101b4: pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra 'byin cing tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'adi dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// gang spang ngan 'gro mchog tu sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa yi/
101b5: ming yang bde gshegs stobs kyis deng du med mdzad dang // bsod nams mi ldan sems can rnams la'ang rgyal ba mchog/ byams par mdzad ma kye ma ngo mtshar rmad du byung // bdag
101b6: cag rnams kyi rmongs pa'i snying gis bsgrubs pa yi/ / sdig pa'i las gang shin tu bgyid dka' sna tshogs pa// de dag thub pa'i bya dag de ring gro bur du// skad cig tu ni ji ltar rnam par ni
101b7: par 'gyur/ / ji ltar gdugs kyis mun pa mun nag kun bcom dang / ji ltar zhugs 'bar bas ni ras rnams sreg pa dang // gser mas shing bal ltar yang sprin 'thob ji bzhin du/

102a1: de ltar 'gro ba'i sdig pa bde bar gshegs kyis bcom// bde gshegs sras po mthong ngam thos sam dran gyur na// lhan cig skyes dbang 'od zer dra bas sdig 'phrog
102a2: pa/ / 'gro ba yongs kyi srid pa'i spros pa zhig pa yi// thugs dang rtag tu ldan zhing skyo bar 'gyur mi mnga'// mog dang mgo dang snying dang sha khrag tshol rnams dang // srog dang sdug dang
102a3: bu rnams rtswa ltar bor nas ni/ / mi mtshungs sems can don phyir thugs rjes thugs brlan pa// 'jig rten mgon sras de dag rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yi dgas lhogs la chu dang
102a4: ro brgya'i zas rnams dang / / de bzhin skye bo nor 'dod snying dang ldan pa la// thugs rje spyod cing rnam pa sna tshogs tshim mdzad pa// byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog de la skyabs su
102a5: mchi/ / gang dag mnar med pa yang rab tu bsil mdzad pas// mchog tu chabs sems can dmyal ba'ang bsil bar 'gyur// rang bde mi gzigs sems can brtson thugs
102a6: ldan pa/ / 'jig rten mgon sras mnyam med de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang dag srid par 'khor ba'i srid pa'i skyon las grol// stong pa gsum yang las kyi 'bras bu mi 'dor zhing //
102a7: ye shes me yis rnyog pa bsregs kyang thugs rjes brlan// spyod pa brtag med dbang ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma dpal ldan rdo rje snying po bde gshegs sras// mtshan gyi

102b1: mtshan btab sku las 'od stong mang byung ba'i/ / dri ba rnams dang sna tshogs glu yis bdag cag sim// skad cig gis ni dmyal las sum cu'i lha dbang gyur// bdag cag rnams kyis rgyal
102b2: dang rgyal sras rnams dang ni/ / de dag rnams kyis gsungs pa mchog tu zhi chos la// gus bstod dge ba rgya chen de ring gang thob pa// des myur 'jig rten thams cad bde gshegs thob
102b3: par shog/ de ltar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ de dag rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang
102b4: gi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su 'khod de chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu
102b5: 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag
102b6: po lag na rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po rnams kyis mchod nas/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs te bar snang las
102b7: babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che

103a1: pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la lta'o// rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas/
103a2: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lta'o// bltas nas kyang sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// dran pa'i
103a3: gzhus 'phangs pa ye shes rab mda' mang gis/ / ma 'phangs mthur ldan bdud bzhi pham mdzad cing // 'jig rten nyon mongs nyen pa'i mun pa bsal mdzad nas// bla ma sprin med zla ba
103a4: bzhin du lhang nge'o/ / dam chos 'od mang gti mug bcom pa'i dra ba yis// 'dul ba'i pad+ma'i gnas rnams kha phya nas// ye shes nam mkha' che la dri menga' bar ba'i gzugs// nyi ma
103a5: ji bzhin gdung bar bgyi ba'i bdud sde gdungs/ / mu stegs can gyi nga rgyal mtha' dag pham mdzad cing // 'gro ba'i 'dod chags rab gdung ma lus rab zhi mdzad// dge ba'i lo tog
103a6: rtsi chen yang dag 'phel mdzad pa/ / dge ba'i char pa phab cing 'brug ltar skrag tu gsol// mgon po mu stegs can gyi wa brgya pham mdzad cing // bdud rnams bcom ste byang chub dam pa
103a7: rab brnyes nas/ / ma 'dres bsags pa'i bden pa'i stobs kyi mthu mnga' ba// skye ba'i 'jigs lam rab grol seng ge ji bzhin sgrogs// spyod pa zab cing brtan la brtag pas mi dpog

103b1: pa/ / sems can gnas gyur stobs dang ting 'dzin nor bu bkram// dri med chos lhun 'dul ba'i ri bo rnams 'dzin pa// ye shes rgya mtsho mchog khyod skye dgu mchog gtso ba// tshul khrims
103b2: bzang po'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i chus btab 'phel/ / byams dang bzod pa'i me tog yal ga 'khrungs pa mdzes// byang chub lam gyi yan lag 'bru chags 'dod byas bsten// bsod nams
103b3: dpag bsam shing khyod de ring ga las byung / / sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bar ba'i mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan// dpe byad bzang mchog rin chen man shel gyis bskor cing // sa dang dbang dang dam
103b4: chos phur pa brtan btab pa/ / lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo khyod ni 'gro la mdzes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
103b5: chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rin po'i pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs
103b6: gcig tu 'dug go/ / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs
103b7: p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal byung ba nas

104a1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/
104a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rigs kyi bu de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin
104a3: du nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang /
104a4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
104a5: khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug
104a6: cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
104a7: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mchog rang bzhin gyis rnam par nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad 'byung ba nas/ byang chub

104b1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
104b2: mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying
104b3: po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rab
104b4: gsal dbang phyug rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal brtsegs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
104b5: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du ba dar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying
104b6: po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams na bcom ldan
104b7: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams the tsom dang bral ba nas/ b

105a1: yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba
105a2: nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de
105a3: bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
105a4: rin chen rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen blo gros zhes bya ba byang
105a5: chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas
105a6: nyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po
105a7: che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mal

105b1: rab tu gnas pa'i ri dbang gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma bkod pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sem
105b2: dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying
105b3: po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du steng gyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
105b4: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi tsher ma dkrugs pa nas/ byang chub
105b5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi sgrib pa las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig
105b6: rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i
105b7: snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ / de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa du ma bstan pas

106a1: gzhal med khang dang / me tog gi sprin dang / rin po che'i sprin dang / phye ma'i sprin dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
106a2: rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan gyi sprin dang / rin po che'i spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / an da rnyil dang / byu ru dang / mar gad dang / mu tig dmar po dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi
106a3: sprin dang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che'i pad+ma du mas khebs pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i
106a4: 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa gzhal du med cing brjod du med par gtog pa/ kwa'i klung gi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/
106a5: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du legs par brgyan par kun tu snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de
106a6: d ag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad de na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu
106a7: brkyang ste 'jam zhing gnyen la rab tu gzhon zhing / pad+ma dang yal ga gzhon sha chags shing 'jam pa'i sor mo'i ngos can gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu dang / bum pa dang / nya dang /

106b1: sgo khang dang / gzhal med khang dang / dung dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / dpal be'u dang / 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dus nas sbyin pa'i pha
106b2: tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rgyu mthun pas mngon par grub pa'i dpe byad bzang pos rnam par sbas pa/ sen mo bangs 'dra zhing rgyas la sdum zhing srab pa'i nor bu'i mdongs kyi me tog
106b3: gi 'od zer gyis khrigs ma mdzes par gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang yang dag par mthun pa'i phyag rnams kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang dag par
106b4: gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir spyi bo la byugs nas dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad cing 'di skad ces/ kye rigs
106b5: kyi bu gang gi phyir bdud sdig can dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma dad cing sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sems can
106b6: thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa thams cad tshar bcad pa rnam par gzhig pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa sems zhum
106b7: pa brtson 'grus brtan po ma yin pa'i go cha bgos pa rnams kyang yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / rab tu dga' bar byas pa nas khams gsum par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi

107a1: bar dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir/ khyod rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen
107a2: po'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsags pa/ yongs su rdzogs pas grub pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos spras pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang /
107a3: dbang dang / gzungs dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthu grub pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa'i
107a4: sgrib pa nye bar zhi ba/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yo dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du lhung ba'i 'jigs pa'i dus kyi tsher ma ma lus par 'don pa dang /
107a5: lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / ma'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang /
107a6: dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i'ikhor mngon par dga' ba can dag la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dga' ba du ma kun tu skyed pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to//
107a7: de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gzengs bstod de rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas rang rang gi phyag bskums te/ rang rang gi byang chub sems

107b1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos nyan du gzud pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bkye'o/ / de dag gis gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams
107b2: cad kyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs chen
107b3: po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos ji tsam du skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskums pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskums pa tsam gyis skad cig thang cig/
107b4: yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mo mjed der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
107b5: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ de'i tshe gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po
107b6: lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'di rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings pa 'di las khrol la/ ci nas kyang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / chos la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang
107b7: dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan yang gang dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye

108a1: chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang dag ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs nas kyang
108a2: ci nas khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so
108a3: legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ yang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'o sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed
108a4: pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba
108a5: la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to//
108a6: che mchem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'ang me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te/ 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing
108a7: 'bar te/ 'jigs su rung ba'i mche ba rnon po drag po gzangs can 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa gtsigs te/ mche ba mnan nas ma lce chen po ltar s+pha ra ser zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug ste/

108b1: mi bzad pa rna ba las 'phyang ba'i sbrul dug 'thor dang / ba lang sna lta bu dang / gzar bu ltar bu dang / sbrul chen po kha gdangs pa'i kha nas byung ba'i mche ba'i rtse mo nas dug drag po 'bar ba 'byung
108b2: ba'i tshogs kyi 'phreng bas bzhin dum 'bar ba/ lag pa stong phrag dum la rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / gtun shing dang / gtun shing rked nyag dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lcags
108b3: sgrog la sogs pa thogs pa'i mtshon cha'i rtse mo la me stag rab tu 'phro ba'i snang bas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po
108b4: dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / ma mo dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa sdang ba rab tu sdang ba'i sems can skrag par byed pa/ ri dgas kyi dbang
108b5: po'i pags pa khrag dang bcas pa sham thabs su bgos pa/ sbrul chen po'i lus kyis rgya gram du dam du bcings pa/ 'jigs pa bas kyang 'jigs par byed pa/ 'tsho ba dag kyang skrag par byed pa/
108b6: khams gsum pa thams cad kyis bsdus pa lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa'i khro bor gyur nas/ lus kyi tshogs thams cad las kyang khro bo kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang
108b7: dmar po dang / dkar po dang / nag po ste/ thams cad kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin can/ khro gnyer mi mnyam pas rnam par spras pa'i gnyer ma'i khrem gnyer can gyi dpral ba'i dbyes nas me stag lta bu'i

109a1: rdul gyi thigs pa rtsub po 'dzag pa las dug 'chang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu byung bas yan lag dang / nying lag kun tu dkris pa'i mngon rtags can du gyur cing rdo rje drag shul can
109a2: du snang ste/ mche bas mi bzad par 'dug pa'i kha gdangs pa las ha ha zhes gar mo rta gad 'byung zhing / 'dzag pa'i dus kyi rlung gis char pa dang bcas pa'i sprin dkrugs pa las char gyi rgyun rags pa
109a3: 'bab pas yongs su gang bas rgya mtsho dkrugs nas rlabs chen po g.yo ba dang / rta rgod ma'i kha nas me byung ba lta bu'i hUM zhes bya ba za ba tsang brtan pas rgyu ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs 'jigs skrag ste/
109a4: 'byer zhing 'thor nas sngangs te skyabs su 'dong zhing 'dud pas/ nyi ma stong pas 'bar ba'i lus rnams mthong ba na/ sna sgar skur can zhom pa lta bu bu ga zab mo'i sbubs kyi nang nas sbrul sna
109a5: tshogs 'khyil pa'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od kyis 'gram pa rnam par mdzes pa/ glog stong 'dus pa ltar ser zhing dmar ba'i mig gi 'bras bu'i 'od zer gyis skra'i tshogs rtsub cing gshor la gyen du
109a6: 'greng ba'i rtse mo brgyan cing 'dres te gsal bar gyur pa/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka stong gis gdugs byas shing / sbrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / ska rags dang / dpung rgyan dang / gdu
109a7: bu dang / rna chas lus brgyan pa/ rdo rje 'bar ba dri ma med cing drag shul can mi bzad pa lag na thogs pa/ mdzub mo rnams las hUM zhes bya ba'i sang ge'i sgra chen po dag gis bgegs dang log

109b1: 'dren thams cad kun tu sdigs pa dag 'thon te/ gang de dag gi mig dang kha rnams nas gnam grum pa lta bu'i sgra chen po'i tshogs las me lce chen po 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi snang ba byung ste/ des
109b2: sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul kyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
109b3: tshig par byed do/ / rmongs par byed do// 'tshog par byed de/ mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ rtsub pa/ sdug bsngal pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed do// de dag tshor bas nyen
109b4: pas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su dong ngo / / de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis bgegs dang log 'dren de dag tshor ba chen pos nyen te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su dong ba mthong nas 'jig
109b5: sngangs skrag ste skyabs ma rnyed nas rlung drag pos bskyod pa'i shing bzhin du 'dar/ rab tu 'dar te ngu bar 'dod na'ang du ma nus nas rimo bzhin du lus thams cad g.yo ba med par gyur to// de nas gsang
109b6: ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud sdig can 'dul bar byed de sdang ba gdon dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jom
109b7: par byed pa/ rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de lta bu'i gzugs su 'dug pa'i rkang pa gnyis las khro bo 'bar zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug

110a1: pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can seng ge'i sgra chen po hUM zhes bya ba 'di gnyis phyung ste/ de gnyis skar mda' bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil du rgyang ring du 'phur te nam mkha' la gnas
110a2: pa'i shugs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/
110a3: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la'adi skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu co bgyi bka' stsol cig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ yang dpral ba'i dkyil
110a4: nas rdo rje khro bo 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs can mche ba mi bzad pa drag pas 'jigs su rung ba'i kha gdangs te/ mchu ma rungs par bsgyur ba'i kha nas dus kyi tha ma 'dzag pa'i tshe rnam par 'thor ba'i
110a5: rlung drag po'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i sprin nag po'i tshigs rab tu sgrog pas rnam par dkrugs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgra drag po lta bu'i hUM zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgras gang ba/ bgegs dang
110a6: log 'dren thams cad 'jigs nas 'bros shing sgyid lug nas phyogs smad par byed pa/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / sen mo dang / mig dang / ag tshom dang / sgra thams cad rdo rje 'bar bar
110a7: snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzi brjid thams cad kyi gzi brjid rnams rang gi gzi brjid kyis zil du rlag par byed cing

110b1: rgyang ring du byed pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rnams kyi 'od lham mer ma yin/ ldan ner ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin par byed pa/ gang nyi ma dang
110b2: zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa/ mthu che ba'ang lham mer ma yin/ lhan ner ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems
110b3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa rnams kyi 'od ma gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad 'od mog mog por byed pa gzhan phyung ngo / / de nas rdo rje khro bo des bcom ldan 'das de
110b4: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas gas
110b5: bapa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu ci bgyi bka' stsol cig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras
110b6: so/ / skyes bu dam pa dag deng la bdud sdig can dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'dzin du chug cig/ 'di dam tshig la gnas par gyis shig/ gzhan yang gang dag sdang ba gdon dang /
110b7: bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / de bzhin

111a1: gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mi 'jug pa dang / mi rtogs pa dang / yid mi ches pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas par gyis shig dang / des
111a2: sems can thams cad kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i tshig
111a3: mnyan nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'ang bzung ste/ dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu seng ge'i sgra chen po hU~M zhes bya bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par
111a4: 'gengs shing / gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
111a5: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo//
111a6: rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i lcags kyu la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i gnam lcags la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i shugs la phyag 'tshal lo//
111a7: rdo rje be con la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje yan lag dmar la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro lding ba la phyag 'tshal lo//

111b1: rdorje lo nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i kho bo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM trarba trarba/ troT ya tro u0f7f ya/ s+phurba sUH/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ mo Ta moH/ mo Ta ya mo r+tha la g
111b2: +hur+Nab+hut+ta/ g+huHpa ya sUr+N+Na pa ya/ sarba satwA ni/ tra sa tras/ trA sa ya tra sa la/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ saM b+h+ra ma ya saM b+h+ra ma ya/ sarba b+hU tA nau/ kun+na ya kurtA ya/ saM kun+da ya saM kurtA ya/ sarba sha trAH/
111b3: g+har+d+ha g+han+ta/ saM g+han+tha ya saM g+har+d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba bid+d+ha badz+ra badz+ra/ s+pho Ta ya badz+ra badz+re/ ka Ta ya badza badz+ra/ maT ya badz+ra badz+ra/ uts+tsharba yaM badza badz+ra/ han badz+ra 'dza/ da ha badz+ra badz+ra/ pa tsa badz+ra
111b4: badz+ra/ ma tha ba dza ba dza/ u ta sA da ya ma hA badz+ra badz+ra/ d+hA ra badz+ra pA Ni pr-i ye/ ka ha ka ha/ ha sa ha sa/ ma hA TA Ta Ta hA sa/ kha cig tu rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'khrugs pa lta bur zab tsang 'jigs
111b5: su rung ba'i hUM zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgra sdang ba rab tu sdang ba bgegs dang log 'dren kun tu skrag par byed pa dang / sdang ba thams cad gzhom du gsol/ 'joms su stsal du gsol
111b6: hUM hUM phaT/ badz+ra ba ra pra da s+phoT/ bsgrub par bya ba lha dang / lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / ma mo dang / 'byung po dang /
111b7: gdon gyi tshogs mthar 'byin pa 'byer bar mdzad pa hUM hUM phaT/ he he phaT/ a mo g+ha phaT/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag

112a1: dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ 'byer bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang /
112a2: chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du sbrul du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ 'byer bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin khang khyim dang bcas pa/
112a3: bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ 'thab bral gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs
112a4: dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ dga' ldan gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.ye
112a5: par bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ 'phrul dga'i lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/
112a6: hUM hUM phaT/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ de bzhin
112a7: du'odagasal dang tshangs ris nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris 'og min gyi bar gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal

112b1: du gsol/ hUM hU~M phaT/ 'byer par bgyod du stsal du gsol/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams rengs par mdzad du gsol/ rmugs par mdzad du gsol/ rmongs par mdzad du gsol/ kar+tha
112b2: bar gsol/ gcad du gsol/ gzhig tu gsol/ rnam par gzhig tu gsol/ mnan du gsol/ huM hUM phaT/ oM khro bo khro bo chen po rnam par bkra ba/ ser skya bo/ nag po/ dmar po/
112b3: ser po/ mi pham pa/ rtag tu 'bar ba'i khro bo/ su ru su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ ku ru tu ru tu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru g+hu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tha ra tha ra tha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/
112b4: ya ra ya ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ku hu ku hu/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ lu nu lu ru/ sar+b+ba nA lA ma ma hUM/ pu lu pu lu/ len taM lo ha sau len te/ mu lu lang khA se/ tsu lu tsu len ta/ ma lu pu len
112b5: ta/ ma lu ru bi/ ku paM pur+b+ba/ le N+yA s+phu ra g+ha N+yA/ s+phu bo ro tsu/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ su mu su mu ru/ a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ nau ka Te/ ka Ta bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka Ta da Te/ dza ye bi dza ye/
112b6: dza yan+ti/ bi dza yan+ti/ ti mong+ka so/ ma hA ti mong+ga sau/ g+hu tang+ga me g+hu ta/ ba ra ya Ne/ sdang ba rnams la rjes su 'doms pa/ ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba/ drag shul can rnams 'byer bar mdzad
112b7: pa/ dpa' bo rnams kyi nang na dpa' ba/ nges pa rnams kyi nang na nges pa/ ma grub pa rnams grub par mdzad pa/ grub pa rnams changad mi za bar mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa mdzad

113a1: pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnas bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bskur mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi rig sngags thams cad kyis byin
113a2: gyis brlabs pa tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ rdo rje ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
113a3: lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyi mdun du dam tshig gang bcas pa de rjes su bskyang du gsol/ rjes su bskyang du gsol/ gshegs su gsol/ myur du
113a4: gshegs su gsol/ bdag gi las rnams myur ba myur bar bsgrub tu gsol/ skrag par byed pa rdo rje 'dzin pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// hu ru hu ru/ grub pa drag po lag na rdo rje bka' stsol
113a5: cig swAhA/ shin tu grub par byed pa la swA hA/ rdo rje chen po la swAhA/ rdo rje phur pa la swAhA/ rdo rje 'joms pa la swAhA/ rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa la swAhA/ rdo rje ki li ki li la swA hA drab po gas gol
113a6: sna mar bo ki li ki li la swA / byis pa ki li ki li la swA hA/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ bdag gi gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / rims thams cad med par mdzod
113a7: cig swAhA/ de nas rdo rje khro bo chen posa'ang skad ces smras pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad dang

113b1: de bzhin du bar snang la rdo rje'i skar mda' chen po'i bai con 'bab par snang ngo / / gnam grub pa'i sgra chen po'ang grag go// kun nas sa chen po 'di grum par kun tu snang ngo // sa chen po'i ser ga de dag
113b2: nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun gyen du byung ngo / / chu'i rgyun de dag gis rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi chu bzhin du sa chen po thams cad kun tu gang bar snang ngo // gang dag sa'i 'og na gnas
113b3: pa'i klu chen po dang / lha chen po dang / lha ma yin chen po dang / de dag thams cad kyang sa'i 'og nas 'thon cing / ri rab kyi drung du 'thon te gyen du byung nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ngo //
113b4: de nas drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i 'byung po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang kun tu 'bar/ rab tu
113b5: 'bar zhing / kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag gis rang rang gi lus kun tu rnam par 'joms par shes te/ de dag sdug bsngal mi bzad cing drag la rtsub pos nyan nas ha ha zhes
113b6: bya ba'i ngu skad 'thon te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po bdag cag skad cig gis srog kyang ma mchis par 'gyur du bgyid na/ 'jigs pa chen por lhung ba 'di las yongs
113b7: su bskyab tu gsol/ bgegs dang log 'dren rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan 'jog rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad na gnas pa dang / r-i dang / chu bo dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing dang /

114a1: dur khrod dang / shing dang / thibs po dang / khron pa rnying pa dang / btung ba dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / gtsug lag khang zhigs pa dang / gnas dang /
114a2: lha khang na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa chen po lhung ba 'di las yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes ched du brjod pa ched du
114a3: brjod do/ / de bzhin du lha'i khang pa thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos te/ mog mog por gyur cing 'od med par kun tu snang ngo // bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyang kun tu
114a4: 'bar zhing / kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te ma lce gcig tu gyur par snang ngo // gang dag bdud kyi ros kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje khro bo chen pos sngangs skrag ste/ rang rang gi mgo
114a5: rdo rje rnams kyis rnam par 'joms pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po
114a6: lag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo / / bdud sdig can yang shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bas nyam thag cing skrag la zhum ste/ gnod pas spangs nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ngo // chos la
114a7: skyabs su song ngo / / dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo // gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag

114b1: yongs su skyobs shig/ yongs su skyobs shig/ bdag nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro'o// chos la skyabs su 'gro'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su
114b2: 'gro'o/ / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir pha lta bu dang / ma lta bu dang / spun lta bu dang / gnyen lta bu dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams lta bur 'gyur bar byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
114b3: ba dag dang phyin chad sems can thams cad kyi pha dang / ma dang / spun dang / gnyen dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams su 'gyur bar bya'o// lus dang / ngag dang / yad kyi las cung zad gang
114b4: ci byed de sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / bdag dbugs phyung nas gzhan yang dbugs dbyung ngo // bdag grol nas gzhan yang
114b5: dgrol lo/ / bdag mya ngan las 'das nas gzhan yang mya ngan las bzla'o// rus pa dang / rkang dang / khrag dang / sha dang / nyams mthu dang / srog gis kyang sems can thams cad
114b6: la rim gror bya'o/ / mchod par bya'o// rjed par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / slob dpon dang / bla
114b7: ma'i gnas thams cad la'ang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ / bsti stang bya'o// rim gror bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de nas bdud sdig can gyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bzung

115a1: ste/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dga' ba thob nas sgra skad kying rogacig tu 'di skad ces smras so//
115a2: gang gi phyir na bdud khyod kyis/ sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir// bla med byang chub sems bskyed pa// bdag cag rjes su mi rang ngo // rin chen sems 'dis mi ring bar// rnam 'dren
115a3: sangs rgyas gyur nas ni/ / sems can shin tu sdug bsngal kun// mya ngan las ni bzla bar gyis// rgyal ba'i mchog 'di ji bzhin du// skye dgu thams cad gdul bar byos// stobs po
115a4: tshe dang ldan pa yis/ / bdud bzhi po dag gdul bar gyis// de skad ces smras pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de sangs rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi lag gi snyom pa na me tog
115a5: gi phur ma thogs par shes/ me tog gi phur ma de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i
115a6: bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje'i khro bo de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub
115a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la gtor ba dang / de'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog gi gzhal med khang chen por gyur to// bdud sdig can ni mchog tu bde bas tshim par gyur nas/

115b1: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smon pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su sems pas mdun du rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag
115b2: bsam gyi shing du mas mog mangs ris brgyad du bres pa/ rin po che dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+ha ru dang / mar gad dang / bai DUn dang / an rnaMl
115b3: dang / mthon ka chen po dang / ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje chen po dang / dun las dang / dun las chen po dang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi dra bas rnam par spras pa/
115b4: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan bsgrengs pas legs par brgyan pa/ me tog go 'phreng bas klubs pa/ pog snod du ma nas bdug pa dri zhim po'i
115b5: ngad kyis dri zhim par byas pa/ phye ma dro zhim po'i bsgo bas bsgos pa/ lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu len cing gar byed pa/ rdzing bu yan lag brgyad
115b6: dang ldan pa'i chu can 'bum phrag du ma'i dbus nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pal dang / dri mchog byung bas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs dang ldan pa
115b7: byung nas/ de mchog tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes pa des gus pa thams cad kyis de blangs nas bdud kyi mthu chen po dang / bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / bdud

116a1: kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos lag pa gnyis kas spyi bol blangs te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rjel dga' ba dang mchod pa'i phyir phul te/
116a2: tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'jig rten dag la dbang byed dbang gis 'byor gyur pa// stobs bcu'i sras rab mchog ldan khyod la brten nas su//
116a3: byang chub phyir ni chags bral dri med byang chub sems// sems can bde sgrub gter dang 'dra ba bdag gis thob// bdag mig gti mug mun pas dri chen dri med gyur// srid pa'i 'dod
116a4: chags rab tu zhi zhing spros dang bral/ / mya ngan 'das pa'i drang po'i lam ni bdag la bstan// sems dmyal mi bzad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// sdig bral 'jig rten mgon la
116a5: skyabs su ma song ba/ / kye ma dman pa yun ring ji lta slus shig gu// de ring thub dbang sras po rnams la bsod nams dang // dad dang snying rje ting 'dzin thob nas ngo mtshar gyur// sa mdog
116a6: gcig pur sangs rgyas myur du grub par shog/ gcig pus 'gro ba ma lus mya ngan bzla bar bya// srid pa gzhan na kun tu rgyu tshe ba dag gi yod// rang phan 'jug dang dge ba shes bral bar
116a7: ma gyur cig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mngon par bstod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to//

116b1: nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag sdang ba dang / gdon dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren de
116b2: dag thams cad gang gis sems can thams cad la rnam par rtsom pa las rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / bgegs mi byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs
116b3: pa'i dam tshig 'dzin du chug cig/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag la mi 'jigs pa'ang byin cig/ de sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mya ngan las nges pa
116b4: zan me pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag gis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes te tshig la mngon par dga'
116b5: nas/ yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag thams cad dang / sdang
116b6: pabapa bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / ma mo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / ro langs dang /
116b7: mkha' 'gro dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad/ gdon gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po 'bab pas dkrugs pa'i mtsho chen po zab mo

117a1: glong 'khyil pa/ 'u ra'u ra sgra 'byung ba lta bur drag cing rgyun ring ba'i skad gsang mthon pos 'di skad ces smras so// sdang ba 'byung po dang / gdon dang /
117a2: bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sem dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa khyed thams cad nyon
117a3: cig/ khyed kyis deng phan chad sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa dag dang / de la sogs pa gang dag gsang sngags sgrub bam/ klog pa de dag la
117a4: bgegs 'byung bar mi bya zhing 'tshe bar mi bya ste/ sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun par stobs sbyin par bya'o// sems can gang dag dam tshig la ma zhugs pa de dag la bsrung bar bya/ zhi
117a5: ba dang bde lags su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / rig sngags 'grub par sbyin par bya'o// sbrang rtsi dang / tshogs ma dang
117a6: sgog pa dang / ke'u dang / gtor ma dang / 'byung po dang / mi bgrungs pa rnams kyis sha dang zas zos kyang skyon du mi gzung zhing nyes par mi brtsi'o// de nas sdang ba 'byung po dang
117a7: bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad ces bya ba nas/ sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro// rigs kyi bu dag bka' lung

117b1: ci stsal ba de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ / deng slad chad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa
117b2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo chen po de dag dang / sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dre
117b3: dang / 'byung po dang / gdon gyi tshogs de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rig sngags kyi las dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'dzin du bcug go// gsang
117b4: ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'ang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la
117b5: 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu gang la gnas nas khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa dang / bdud sdig can yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
117b6: gzhan yang sdang ba gdon dang / 'byung po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad dam tshig la bkod cing byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du bcug pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya//
117b7: de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ tshe dang ldan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni ming dang / yi ge dang /

118a1: sgra skad kyis rtogs par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ming ngam/ gzugs sam/ dbyibs sam/ gnas sam/ mnyam par bzhag pa'am
118a2: g.yengs pa'ang rung ste/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i chos de gang yang med do// gang la ming med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / dbyibs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / mnyam par
118a3: gzhag pa med pa dang / g.yeng ba med pa 'di btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya zhes de la ji snyam du sems/ yang btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gsal bar byed pa 'di ni
118a4: bdag la gsal bar byed pa ma yin/ gzhan la gsal bar byed pa ma yin/ gnyis ka la gsal bar byed pa ma yin no// 'on kyang gsal bar byed par brtags pa yod do// de la
118a5: gsal bar byed pa ni gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid kyis stong / bdag ni bdag gis stong / gzhan yang gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis stong / gnyis ka'ang gnyis ka'i bdag nyid kyis
118a6: stong ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu brtags pa'i phyir ro// 'di ci zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi tshig de'ang tshig gi bdag nyid kyis stong ste/ yi ge'ang yi ge ma yin no// de ltar na rten cing
118a7: 'brel par 'byung ba'i don rtogs par byed pa yin no/ / don de brjod pa na'ang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro mod kyi/ gzhan gyi dbang la brten pa'i phyir yi ger btags pa'ang

118b1: yod do/ / yongs su btags pa yin pa'i phyir btags pa'ang stong pa'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang nyid stong pa'o// rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir rten cing
118b2: 'brel par 'byung ba'ang stong pa'o/ / glo bur du rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis stong ngo // de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo //
118b3: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa gang yin pa de mtshan nyid med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
118b4: gang yin pa de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do/ / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de rtogs pa'o// rtogs pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid do// /
118b5: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de lhag mthong ngo // lhag mthong gang yin pa de zhi gnas so// zhi gnas gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'o// rnam par thar pa gang yin pa de dbu ma'i lam yin no// dbu
118b6: ma'i lam gang yin pa de la mtha' gcig med/ mtha' gnyis med/ gzung ba med/ 'dzin pa po med/ 'dzin pa med/ chad pa med/ rtag pa med/ skye ba med/ 'gag pa med
118b7: rtog pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med/ rang dbang med/ gzhan gyi dbang med/ 'gro ba med/ 'ong ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med/ rnam par byang ba med/ 'du ba med/ 'bral

119a1: pa med do/ / de ni lhag mthong yin no// lhag mthong gang yin pa de la phung po rnams med/ khams rnams med/ dbang po rnams med/ skye mched rnams med/ yul
119a2: rnams med/ yul du gdags pa med/ las med/ las kyi 'bras bu med do// gang la las med cing las kyi 'bras bu med pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo//
119a3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa de chos so//
119a4: chos gang yin pa de mo skye mi 'chi'o// mi skye mi 'tsho ba gang yin pa de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge
119a5: 'dzin bstan pa 'do ni shin tu zab ste/ 'di la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba'ang med na/ 'jig rten pa'i mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad lta smos kyang
119a6: ci dgos/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / mos pa chung ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba ste/ gzhan du na 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi yul du gyur pa
119a7: ni ma gtogs so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan na dmigs pa med pa gnas pa med pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr

119b1: dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa med do//
119b2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid med pa yin na/ de la ji ltar skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
119b3: gnyis dang ldan zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bstan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku legs par brgyan/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnam par gzhag par lta/ ji ltar
119b4: de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu skyes bu
