119b5: chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi brda'i tshig go/ / rgyan ces bya ba de ni spros pa'i yi ge dang sgra'o// dpe byad bzang po zhes bya ba de ni sgyu ma dang rmil mgyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan
119b6: nyid do/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba de ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba de ni tshogs gnyis kyis sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do//
119b7: btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i yul te/ de la sku'i gsang ba zhes bya ba de ni bsod nams chen po'i rgyu mthun pa'i mtshan nyid do// bsod nams kyi

120a1: rgyu mthun pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku ste/ 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i 'phrin las dang sku'i gsang ba'o// btsun
120a2: pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gsung zhes bya ba de na kun rdzob don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do/ / kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'o//
120a3: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chad pa med pa dang rtag pa med par 'jug pa thugs su chud pa/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i lam gyis 'jug pa bsam gtan goms par byas pas shes par
120a4: bya ba ste/ dmigs pa med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bas stong pa/ lus kyi yul ma yin pa/ ngag gi spyod yul ma yin pa/ yid kyi rang gi ngo bo'i yul ma yin pa gang
120a5: yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nam mkha'i khams su yang dag par 'du ba'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa de ltar blta bar bya'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa
120a6: ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o/ / chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam du blta'o// dbu ma'i lam gang yin pa de
120a7: na mi skye mi 'chi ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos kyi sku 'di na gnas pa nyid do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba de

120b1: ni pha rol tu phyin pa dag gi rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o/ / de la pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de'ang bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa nyid du blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin
120b2: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni phyi nang gi dngos po rnam pa gnyis yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ / de la phyi zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi tshig go// nang zhes bya ba de ni don dam pa'i tshig go// de la
120b3: phyi zhes bya ba de ni gang zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams dang / de bzhin du bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tshe ba dang / glang po che dang /
120b4: rta dang / shing rta dang / sa dang / mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / rus pa'i bar du sbyin pa ste/ de'ang thabs kyi pha rol
120b5: tu phyin pas yongs su zin pas yongs su bsngos pa rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang / gya nom pa dang / rgya che ba dang / rang gis bsti stang du byas te rnam pa thams cad sems can thams cad la sbyin
120b6: pa'adi ni phyi'i 'o/ / nang gi ni chos sbyin pa'o// de'ang rnam pa gnyis te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug par yang dag par gzhol ba dang / sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi
120b7: gtam dang / bzod pa'i gtam nga / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi gtam dang / snying rjes yongs

121a1: su zin pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba'o/ / gzhan yang nang gi sbyin pa ni gang 'di mthar 'dzin pa dang / skye ba dang 'gag par yongs su rtog pa dang /
121a2: rnam par rtog pa dang / shes pa dang / shes bya rnam par spangs pa dga' bas yongs su zin pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyi sbyin pa'o// gang 'di nyid
121a3: la lus dang / ngag dang / yid rgod pa med pa dang / khengs pa med pa dang / lus rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / ngag rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / yid rnam par g.yeng ba med par
121a4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa/ gcig tu nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa/ btang snyoms kyis yongs su zin pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba 'do ni tshul
121a5: khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / gang 'di nyid la rang gi lus dang srog la mi lta bar bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / chos dang / chos ma yin pa dang / bden pa dang
121a6: bden pa ma yin pa dang / g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba'i dngos po rnam par spong zhing byams pas yongs su zin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni 'dir bzod pa'i pha
121a7: rol tu phyin pa'o/ / gang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir sems spro zhing rtsom pa dang / yongs su mi skyo bar rtag tu gnas pa med pa dang /

121b1: de dmigs pa med pa dang / byams pas yongs su zin pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni 'dir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'din
121b2: bsod nams kyi tshogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku'i gsang ba grub par byed pa'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang pha
121b3: rol tu phyin pa bzhi po 'di dag nyid rdzogs pa ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 'byed pa dang / 'grel pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / de la gzhol zhing mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa
121b4: dang / stong pa dang / gso ba dang / gsog dang / dngos po med pa dang / dngos po thams cad dngos po med par yang dag par ston to// mdor bsdu ba na 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang
121b5: dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa sel cing chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang mnyam par yang dag par ston te// dmigs pa dang bral ba
121b6: 'di ni 'dir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi
121b7: rang gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa 'di ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs so// bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshig

122a1: dang / tshogs 'di gnyis ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / shes pa dang / shes bya mtha' dag dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
122a2: rtogs par byed pa ste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba dag gos mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o// rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni gal te de bzhin gshegs pa
122a3: nyid kyi sku tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs te bstan cing bshad kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ / sku'i gsang ba ji lta ba bzhin du gsung go gsang ba'ang de bzhin no// thugs kyi gsang ba
122a4: ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa dang / so so'i rnam pa dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang / bya ba tha dad pa'i sbyor ba rnams
122a5: kyis kyang bstan par mi spyod mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so rang ga rig pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba yin par shes par bya'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de'i phyir rnam
122a6: grangs 'dis kyang de ltar rig par bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa rnams kyis bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs
122a7: pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa dang / blo gros dang / blo dang / rtogs pa dang / mngon

122b1: par 'dod pa mtha' yas mu med pa dang / sems kyi rgyun rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spyod yul dang / skye gnas sna tshogs dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i las sna tshogs dang /
122b2: mi shes pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / mi snang ba dang / mun nag dang / 'gro ba lnga dang / 'gro ba drug dang / khams gsum pa thog ma dang / dbus dang / 'jig par gnas pa
122b3: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su ma chad par gnas par dus gsum dang / phyogs la mgo rmongs pa skye ba dang rga ba la sogs pa na ba dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
122b4: 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa la sogs pas nyon gcig bzhin du bcom pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can gyi khams ma brgal ba bsgral ba
122b5: dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzud pa dang //
122b6: gnas pa thams cad gyur pa'i lam la dgod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa shin tu bde ba/ don dam pa/ zhi ba/ 'khrug pa med pa/ dge ba/ nad med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
122b7: 'das rnams kyi so so rang gi rog pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sbyor

123a1: ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang /
123a2: mgu ba'i sa la yang dag par gzung pa dang / chos rtogs pa'i khyad par brjod pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po ltar 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus dang tshor las ma 'da' bar bya ba
123a3: dang / de dag la rgyu de'i dbang du byas te skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i chos kyi tshul gcig nas
123a4: gcig tu brgyud de gnas par bya ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu lung byin pas thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang / ye shes goms pa rnal 'byor du gyur pa'i
123a5: rgyud kyi rgyun mi gcad pa dang / skal ba yod la yongs su ma smin pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa'i don gyi phyir/ phyogs tsam gyi sgo gcig mdun du byas te 'jug par byed pa cung zad
123a6: cag bshad par bya'o/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du byung bar gyur te dga' ba thob nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje
123a7: la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// gang gi phyirari kho bo cag lta bu'i nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyis sgra bsgrags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i nyan thos rnams la

123b1: chos phab mo'i tshig gi don 'di lta bu gsal bar byas pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod yang legs so/ / lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no//
123b2: btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya ba zhes de skad zer ba ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag g.yas pa
123b3: gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing mnyen pa shin tu gzhon sha chags pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag ste/ ched du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang
123b4: ched du bka' stsal to/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis gang mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di gsang ba pa'i tshig gi don bzhin du sems can thams cad la lung bstan cing bshad de
123b5: bkrol zhing rnam par phye ba legs so legs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas lag na rdo rje la ji ltar legs so/
123b6: zhes bya ba byin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang gsang pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la phyag bzhag ste/ ched du
123b7: bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal cing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na ming 'dzin pa'ang dkon na rab tu

124a1: gsal bar byed pa lta ci smos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu ga ng+gA'i klung tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tu
124a2: med pa'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul las shin tu 'das pa snyed chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge//
124a3: bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag ni mi
124a4: skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / de bas kyang ches mang ba'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// /
124a5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dpag tu med cing grangs med la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang rnam pa drug
124a6: tu g.yos so/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la'ang chos kyi dgab pa dang mchod pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na rnga rnams ma brdungs par kun nas sgra byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu
124a7: 'phrul gyis gzhal med khang gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su kun nas sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs blangs pas lha'i bu mo rnams gar byed do// spos dang / byug pa dang /

124b1: bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng dang / me tog paH
124b2: dang / ku mu ta dang / ut+pal dang / dri mchog dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / pa ri sha ka dang / pa ri sha ka chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / man da ra ba dang / man
124b3: dar ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / kun nas skyes dang / kun nas skyes chen po'i me tog gi char gyi spun kun nas mngon par bab bo// spos chu'i char gyi sprin yang
124b4: mngon par bab pa'o/ / de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
124b5: lto 'phye chen po dang / ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / skem byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po dang / ma mo dang / yi dgas
124b6: dang / sha za dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / mkhar dang / ri dang sa'i lha la sogs pa sdang ba gdon bgebra dang / log
124b7: 'dren thams cad dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag bla gos rnams phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom

125a1: ldan 'das gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag gzir cing
125a2: nye bar gzir bas rig sngags 'chang thams cad la dngos grub stsol ba dang / dam tshig thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa la yang dag par gnang bar bgyid par 'gyur ba rang gi snying po 'di
125a3: bdag cag la bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs de dag la lags so zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag gang gi phyir khyed cag 'di ltar
125a4: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ni legs so legs so/ / de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyed rang rang gi snying po bstan par bya'o// de
125a5: dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rnga bo che dang / rgya mtsho dang / sprin chen po'i sgra lta bu'i gsung tshangs pa chen po'i
125a6: smra bas lhag pa sna tshogs pa snyan cing rgya che la zab pa/ thog ma dang / bar dang / tha mar dge ba/ sems can thams cad kyi stong du 'thad pa/ gsal ba/ 'jebs pa/ dag pa/ mnyen
125a7: pa/ snyan pa/ brjod pa'i tshig khams gsum pa thams cad la go bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i sgra bla na med pa des grub pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so//

125b1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya/ dza yA ba phA/ tsa li tsa li/ mi li mi li/ lu Tu lu Tu/ dzam
125b2: bi dza ye/ dza yan+ti/ bi dza yan+ti/ a dzi te/ a pa rA dza te/ tad+ya te/ sarba duSh+Ta sta ma b+ha ni/ dza ma b+ha ni/ mo ha hi/ shwe te ka rA le/ ke yU re/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+him+bi ti/ pAN+Du rA ba si nau/ par+Na
125b3: sha ba ri/ shri ye ma hA shr-i ye sarba a da b+hu tA ya shri ye/ pad+ma ba he/ pad+mA mA lo ni badz+ra ang ku shi/ badz+ra mA te/ badz+ra pA tA la/ shU li ni ba dza d+ha re/ hi hi hi hi/ badz+ra pA Ni/ he he he he/ badz+ra
125b4: pA Ni/ badz+ra shu li ni/ tsakra d+ha re/ hi hi/ badz+ra pA NI/ he he ba dza pA Ni/ hiM hi hi hi/ he he he he/ badz+ra pA Ni/ ka la ka la/ ba la ba la/ ra la ra la/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ra sa ra/ hra hA hA hA hA/
125b5: tsi li mi li/ tshi le di le/ di di la/ di mi le/ dz+wa le/ ma hA dzA le/ dz+wa li ti/ pra dz+wa li ti/ tha ra thag ge tha re/ mu ku ti/ kA me/ kA ma me/ grub pa'i tshogs kyis phyag byas ma/ lha thams
125b6: cad kyi snying kun tu 'jug par byed ma/ sems can thams cad kyi snying 'bigs ma/ sdang ba rab tu sdang ba thams cad kyi snying 'joms ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rjes su skyong
125b7: ma byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po la 'jug ma tshur shog/ dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig/ sems can thams cad kyi snying rnams khug la dam tshig la khod cig/ thams

126a1: cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo swAhA/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo swAhA/ traT trarba/ s+pho Ta ya swA hA/ gyen du lha la swAhA/ rnam par lta la swAH/
126a2: chu srin la swA hA/ me la swA hA/ tshangs pa la swA hA/ khyab 'jug la swA hA/ drag po rnams la swA hA/ brgya byin la swA hA/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la swAhA/ thams cad la swA hA/ lha rnams la swA hA/
126a3: nor rnams la swA hA/ ma mo rnams la swA hA/ mtshan rnams la swAhA/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad la swAhUM/ sa la swA hA/ dbyangs can la swA hA/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod skyon dang /
126a4: dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / srin po la sogs pa khams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la sAH/
126a5: tshur shog tshur shog/ dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig/ ku ru ku ru/ sa ra sa ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ha na han/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hUM yU puM/ tsar+t+ta l-i/ ma tang gi/ Tom+bi nau/ puk+ka si/ de bzhin
126a6: gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po dang / lha thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs
126a7: pan/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khod de 'jig sngangs skrag par gyur nas/ chu shing gi tshal rlung drag po chen pos bskyod de rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du g.yo zhing 'gul la snying tshig ste/ rdo rje'i phur bus

126b1: btab pa bzhin du zugs shing zhig sa la 'gre zhing skyabs btsal ba'i phyir 'du shes tsam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'bod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
126b2: lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor ba di slong zhig/ ngas dam tshig 'di yongs su 'dzin du gzhug go/ rig sngags grub pa 'byor par byed pa'i snying po la
126b3: gzhol ba bsgrags so/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsang ba pa'i snying po 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad bslang ngo // dkon mchog
126b4: gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM kI li ki la/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi snying po
126b5: mchog tu gsang ba lags te/ rig sngags thams cad 'grub par bgyid pa lags so// des ni bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis ma btang bar mchi'o// dbang du mchi'o// dngos grub
126b6: stsal bar bgyi'o/ / lung bzhin bgyi'o// bsrung bgyi'o// dpal bskyed par bgyi'o// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par bshig go// sems can thams cad gdul bar
126b7: bgyi'o/ / 'byung po thams cad rnam par bshig par bgyi'o// nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi stong

127a1: po mchog tu gsang ba 'di nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa chen po bgyid pa na/ gnod pa bgyid pa bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis
127a2: rnam pa gtses pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin me ltar blos rnam par bsgyings shing rnam par rol pa
127a3: mngon shes dri zhim snang dpal gyis bdag la bsrung ba'i slad du stsal to/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu 'khor de thams cad bsam gtan
127a4: gyi dga' ba dang bde bas tshim par gyur te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstan pa la gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
127a5: stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ 'dzin du chug cig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab
127a6: tu ston cig dang / des sems can mang po la yun ring por phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bla na med pa/ chags pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa thog cing
127a7: rtogs par 'gyur ro/ / su chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa

127b1: dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa de ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
127b2: rluchub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs dma' ba rnams su skye bar
127b3: mi 'gyur/ dbul po'i rigs rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab med par yang ma yin/ ma dul bar ma yin/ tshe thung bar ma yin zhing / tshe rabs tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par
127b4: 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rab tu dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'khor ngan pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro// /
127b5: tshig gzung bar 'os shing snyan par 'gyur ro// skal ba bzang zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro// shes rab chen po dang / spobs pa chen po dang / dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
127b6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong bar 'gyuraro// /
127b7: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing che zhing mtha' yas

128a1: pa la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du de byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la bgegs dang / log
128a2: 'dren dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa dang / 'byung po dag dang / gdon gyi tshogs dang / ma mo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
128a3: ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad
128a4: dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de la rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams
128a5: cad kyang srung zhing sbed pa dang yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro/ / de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang sla bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
128a6: dam tshig la zhugs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags
128a7: 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du bstan

128b1: pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrib pa med pa skor ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa zhes
128b2: bya ba yang zung zhig/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bdud kyi phyogs 'dul ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rten cing 'brel par
128b3: dbyung ba la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o mtshan nyid ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang /
128b4: dam tshig thams cad la rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i
128b5: khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la legs so zhes gsol te mngon par dga' nas cang
128b6: mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i
128b7: snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang

129a1: mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/
129a2: la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na sid+d+ha
129a3: dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar
129a4: skad du/ Ar+ya ba dza a dzi ta a na la pra mo ha ni na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
129a5: dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa can gyi ri'i gangs ri sul gyi mchog/ ri rab kyi
129a6: smad dang rked ltar gser gyi rdo sna tshogs kyis gang zhing ri'ur bres pa 'bar ba/ rin po che'i rdo du ma'i 'od sna tshogs 'ja' lta bu byung ba'i rdo leb yangs pa/ me tog dri zhim po bkram zhing phye
129a7: ma dang bdug pa dri zhim pa mang pos phug gi nang dang nags bsgos pa/ gdugs dang / a ka ru dang / phye ma dang / dril bu dang / bla res mdzes par byas pa'i ri bo mchog la bzhugs te/

129b1: de na bcom ldan 'das lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
129b2: sbyin rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang /
129b3: snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i me mo'i tshogs khyab par byed pa rgya chen po dag gis dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gyur par 'dus te/ de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
129b4: bdun khri lnga stong dang / dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang thabs cig go/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos ston te gnas par bde ba/ mnyan na pade ba/ 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba'i
129b5: chos ston to/ / de na lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams
129b6: dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / srin po'i bu rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang /
129b7: 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshigs rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshigs rnams rnam par rgyu zhing ku co dang / 'jigs

130a1: pa dang / nyam thag pa'i sgra 'byin to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sgra de dag gsan
130a2: nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kye bzhin bzangs dag ci'i phyir ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / 'khrug pa'i sgra 'byin/ de dag gos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
130a3: 'das bdag cag ni dbang du bgyis te/ gnod pa dang brang bas bkug cing drangs te mtho btsams na/ bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
130a4: 'das kyis thams cad kyi steng gi dkyil 'khor yangs pa ston pa'i mchog gi blo gros dang / blo dang / las dang / las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa/ sa chen po las sa gzhan thob pa rgyal chub tu
130a5: nye ste/ chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dgongs par mdzad pa tsam gyis 'ongs te/ rdo rje'i zom ltar dpung mgo yangs pa/ rdo
130a6: rje ltar mkhregs pa'i cod pan 'od zer 'tsher ba can/ rdo rje'i dpung rgyan dang ldan pa/ lus mkhregs shing sra ba/ lag na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / lag cha brtan po 'bar ba thogs
130a7: pa/ rdo rje phur bu sra bas rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ mthu chen po g.yog bzhi 'bum lnga khri dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byed cing / rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzhon nu

130b1: dang / rdo rje'i be con dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i tog dang / rdo rje'i snang ba dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / rin po che'i rdo rje dang / gsang ba'i rdo rje dang / 'khor lo rdo rje la sogs pa dang /
130b2: rdo rje'i dmag dpon chen po rnams dang / dmag skyong rnams dang / sa skyong rnams dang / rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa yang dag par rtogs pa rnams dang /
130b3: rdo rje'i yum rnams dang / rdo rje rnam par 'dren pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rdo rje gzhon nu'i gdon rnams dang / rdo rje gnon po rnams dang / rdo rje rmi lam ngan byed rnams yang dag par bskul/
130b4: rnam par bskul zhing 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'dus pa kun snang bar byed/ rnam par snang bar byed/ gsal bar byed/ rnam par gsal bar byed/ rab tu dga' bar byed/
130b5: yang dag par bskul/ so sor bskul zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bla gos phung nas zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar
130b6: te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'chang khyod song la lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha
130b7: ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu rnams dang / 'dus pa chen po'i bar dag sgra 'byin cing nyam

131a1: thag pa myong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas rdo rje 'chang stan las langs te/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
131a2: 'byung po'i tshogs kyi nang du song nas rjes su ston cing / rdo rje mtshon cha'i ma sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
131a3: gyi khams su me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba dang / me stag rnam par 'phro ba dang / lce 'bebs pa'i glog rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams nams gzir to// de nas bskal pa chen por sngar
131a4: rmilam dang / chu dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i grangs kyi tshad tsam dag gis mdangs dang / gzi brjid dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ma dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims
131a5: dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / rang gi longs spyod thams cad las byung ba las grub pa'i rdo rje de byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i lag tu phyin no// de ni sangs rgyas
131a6: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rab kyi chos ston par gyur pa/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol
131a7: tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / snying rje byed pa/ rang gi rdo rje dang / rigs kyi rig pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / bklags pa'i tshul du gyur pa/

131b1: drag po dang / dbang po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ de ltar de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das khro
131b2: bo drag po rnams rmongs par byed pa/ sgyu dang ldan pa rnams rmugs par byed pa/ sdang ba rnams spyod pa/ rmongs pa rnams 'jig pa/ dam po rnams rtsad nas 'don pa/ rgyas pa rnams spur
131b3: mar rlog pa/ yon po rnams spong ba/ gcod pa rnams snying rjes byed pa/ 'byung po rnams skrag par byed pa/ srin po rnams spangs par byed pa/ rang gi gsang sngags rnams rdzogs par
131b4: byed pa/ gzhan gyi gsang sngags rnams phur bus 'debs pa/ nus pa rnams ston par byed pa/ gsod par byed pa gsod pa/ gnod par byed pa phung bar byed pa de der song nas/
131b5: lha rnams dang lha'i bu rnams dbang du byed de/ de ltar drag po pa drag po grub pa dang / khyab 'jug pa khyab 'jug grub pa dang / lha ma yin pa lha ma yin grub pa dang / de dag spyir bskul
131b6: bapa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug/ skyong bar byed/ mthu ston par byed/ brjod par byed/ rnam par skrag par byed do// stobs bcus dgongs pa bka' stsal pa'i rdo rje 'chang gsi mi pham
131b7: pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / gzungs 'di'i stobs dang / bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'od kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po las byung ba'i 'od zer

132a1: rnams kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag na rdo rje bskul nas/ 'od des de rab tu dga' ste rdo rje las snang ba bkye ba rnams kyis sa gsum gyi ston gyi skar ma dang zla ba'i 'od
132a2: zil du brlag par byas nas/ snang ba gcig pur byed cing rgya mtsho chen po ni skems/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni g.yo bar byed/ glog gi 'khor lo dang lce 'bebs pa'i 'brug ni bsgrags/
132a3: sgra drag po ni phyeng / bsgyings pa'i sgra ni bsgrags/ skrag par ni byas so// de na rdo rje mo pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs me lce 'od 'phro chen po khong na 'dug pa/ skra
132a4: tshetshogs gser dang rin po che 'dra ba/ rdo rje 'chang ba/ rdo rje'i bu mo zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma des lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ yid ches mgyogs pa'i shugs 'od 'phro zhing
132a5: 'bar ba lta bur drag pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po la skyabs su song ngo // de 'ongs pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang gis smras pa/ skal ba chen po
132a6: dge ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dang ldan ma/ 'di dag la lag cha dang mthun par bya ba'i stobs byin cig/ de nas gzungs kyis smras pa/ 'di dag bka' stsal
132a7: pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes lan gsum tshig tu smras so/ / thor tsugs gsum ma/ sa gsum dang / dus gsum dang / drag po'i rtse gsum dang / khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo dang /

132b1: gshin rje'i be con dang / lus ngan gyi dbyug to dang / dbang po'i rdo rje dang / chu lha'i zhags pa dang / log 'dren rnams kyi bgegs dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sku dang / rlung lha rnams
132b2: kyi gzi dang / shugs dang / grub pa rnams kyi rmongs byed dang / ma mo'i tshigs rnams kyi gcod pa dang / klu rnams kyi dam tshig dang / dug dang / khro bo dang / gnod sbyin dang
132b3: srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / grul bum dang / bden bral dang / gnon po dang / ro langs kyi skabs su rgol ba rnams dang /
132b4: de bzhin du thams cad kyang spyod zhig/ mig gis 'dzum pa tsam gyis yud tsam la thams cad mchod nas/ lag na rdo rje la snying po 'ang phul te smras pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal
132b5: lo/ / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ta thA ga ta sa mA d+hi d+hA ra NI/ ma hA A brta yi Sh+yA mi/ a hi badz+re/ ku Ti lai/ ko Ti pA pa kA ku la shi khi
132b6: ka pi la ke shi/ ta Ti tsa To tsa To mi Ti mi/ karka Ta mu Ti ba Ta nr-i badze/ ma hA bi d+hu la lo le/ bu gu pu lu/ su mu su mu/ sa ra sa ra/ phaT phaT/ su d+yo te/ piM ga le tsa te/ dza la ping+ga le
132b7: sarba de ba ga Na/ pra ha ra Na mA yA/ sid+d+ha dA yi ke/ su ru ke/ ku ru ka/ badz+ra g+ho Ne/ badz+ra dr-i Ta/ sA ra pra ha ra Ne/ rat+na tra ya/ dikra la bud+d+he te/ badz+ra d+ha ra ba shA sa na ka/

133a1: a pra ti ha ta pra marda ni swAhA/ gang gsang sngags la rjes su dran nas klog gam/ sgom mam/ 'dzin pa de thos na ngan 'gro log par lhung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro//
133a2: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// dam tshig dang phyag rgya la zhugs par 'gyur ro// bsam pa dang rjes su yi rang bas
133a3: 'gugs par byed do/ / dug dang / gsang sngags dang / mdud pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnam par skrag par byed do// de nas lha dang lha'i bu de dag gis
133a4: de'i mthus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de'i rnam par rol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rnam pa mang po du ma'ang myong nas/ steng gi gnas gtsang ma dang / 'og min gyi lha dang /
133a5: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa dag gis 'od dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa'i sprin dang / rin po che mang po'i char rgya chen pos mchod nas bstod pa snyan pas bstod de/ snyan cing zab
133a6: la rnga sgra lta bu dang / bsil ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems
133a7: dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs

133b1: byed ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tha dang / dan shI la dang / zhu chen rgya lo tso baban te ye shes skyes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skang ga
133b2: bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / // rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra suk+Sh+ma a pra ti ha ta nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phra mo
133b3: thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs khro bo thams cad le phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
133b4: gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas bzhin rab tu 'bar
133b5: ba bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'dug go// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las bram ze'i khye'u zhig byung ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so//
133b6: gsang ba'i bdag po/ rig pa'i bdag po/ gzungs kyi bdag go/ lha gnas gsum po dag na lha nyam chung ba dang / kluny+dzam chung ba la zil gyis gnon pa drag pos rab tu gzhom pa
133b7: gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / gzungs sngags dam pa rab tu brjod du gsol/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas bde gshegs

134a1: khro bo thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang snying 'di rab tu smras so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha ra ha ra barba
134a2: mtha ma tha badz+ra/ d+hun d+hu na badz+ra/ da ha da ha badza/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra/ d+hA ra ya d+ha ra ya badz+ra/ dA R+sha Na dA R+shaN bAdza/ n+dats+tshan+di badz+ra/ b+hon+da b+hin+da badz+ra/ tsU pha thA/ namaH
134a3: badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hUM phaT thA/ bram ze'i khye'u gang la la zhig gis bde gshegs bdud rtsa'i khyil pa'i cha bzung ste/ khro bo thams cad
134a4: kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu smra zhing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rdo rje phra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyogs bcur spros na/ sems can thams cad kyi bag chags ngan pa byang/ tshe dang bsod nams rab
134a5: tu rgyas te/ dgra dang / dug dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par thar nas/ gang zhig gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa la tsi ma ga d+ha sprin gyis bshig pa'am/ skyu ru ra rlon pa gser
134a6: gyis bzhipas pa bzhin du dmigs te/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di smra zhing / rdo rje phra mo spros pas de dag gis phung po lnga dbang po lnga myur du rlag par 'gyur ro// lhas smras na/ lha'i zla ba gcig gam
134a7: lo lnga na lha ma yin mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/ / dge slong gis smras na/ bdud kyi mtshon cha rnams myur du brtul bar 'gyur ro// mas brjod na/ gang la dmigs pa de mi'i zla ba gcig gam

134b1: mi'i lo ldan nges par rlag par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lag na rdo rje dang bram ze'i khye'u la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i
134b2: skad phyung ste/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di lha gnas gsum por bsgrags so// rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/
134b3: Ar+ya da sha badz+ra pA Ni na hr-i da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
134b4: gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
134b5: bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu'i ming shes sam/ rus shes sam/ gsang sngags shes pa de la
134b6: byad kyis mi tshugs so/ / gnod sbyin dag rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro// srin po rnams dang / lhag ma za ba rnams dang / bdug pa pa rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro// phyis 'jog po rnams
134b7: kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ / tad+ya thA/ u ki ri ma ko ri/ mi rI tsi pA sha pa ri/ u lo me/ mi la me/ i li me/ i li me/ i la mi le me/ he kle d+hi ke/ shuk+She/ d+hu hu re/ pra d+ha re/ a

135a1: pha le/ phA laM pha le/ khu khu me ti ku me tu me/ khi ri khi ri/ sA d+ha sA d+ha/ sarba ba ka kA le/ ban+d+ha ma bka kA le/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po
135a2: 'di dag rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur nas/ bdag gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa'ang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang /
135a3: yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol ba thob cig/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / 'brog gnas dang / gangs
135a4: gnas dang / lngas rtsen dang / nor bu bzang po dang / grags pa bzang dang / lus ngan gyi bus mdzes byed dang / 'phreng ba mdzes dang / rgyal po chen po chos skyong rnam thos kyi bu ste/ gnod
135a5: sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur nas/ bdag gnyid kyis log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa na'ang bsrung ba dang /
135a6: yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol ba thob cig/ gsang
135a7: sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra Ne swA hA/ de la lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams ni 'di dag yin te/ tad+ya thA/ u ke te/

135b1: ke te/ sang ka te/ ud du le/ d+ha d+he/ ta te/ ta ba ta te swA hA/ tsa tsi tsi ti/ tsaM khe lon+te da ne/ b+he da ni/ sarba bIr+yats+tsha da ni/ sarba kr-i ta/ ka kho dzo/ pa ri kr-i ta nA sha ni/ de la rig sngags kyi
135b2: rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dam pa ni 'di rnams yin no/ / tad+ya thA/ a le lak+She/ pa ke le lak+She/ a ke/ pa ke lak+She swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ hu tu hu tu/ sh+tsaH
135b3: tu/ bi tu bi tu/ bi tu tu/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ sa pa te/ pa ta ha ta ye swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga bA to bu d+ha s+ya sod+d+han+tu man+t+ra pa da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
135b4: dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i
135b5: snying po rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / shu rkyen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
135b6: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kur+N+Na l+ya mr-i ta hrid ya tsa tur nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i
135b7: gzungs/ dkon mchog gsung phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas khro bo chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis 'khor 'dus pa thams cad

136a1: la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i sems can rnams ni bsod nams dman pa dang / tshul
136a2: la mi gnas pa dang / pha ma la ma gus pa dang / bsod nams chung ba dang / drad pa ma mchis pa dang / glags tshol ba dang / rtag tu zang zing la brkam pa dang / rtag tu log 'dren dang
136a3: 'tshe ba dang / sha za rnams kyis zin pa lags te/ bgegs dang log 'dren de dag gzhig pa dang / mthar gtugs pa'i slad du gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan
136a4: 'das kyis/ rdo rje khro bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bdud rtsi thab sbyor gang khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni legs so legs so// khyod la dezhin gshegs pas
136a5: gnang gi/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sngags shod cig/ de nas khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa/
136a6: na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsar+N+Na badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ pra dz+wa la ti dIp+tA/ daMSh+To ta kaT/ b+ha ya b+hai ra bA ya/ a sim+b+ha sa la/ badza pa ra shu pA sha har+dz+dza ya/ ta
136a7: oM gu lu hu lu/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da la ni/ kha kha la kha/ kha na khan/ khAd khA da/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha taH/ ha na han/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ban+d+ha bar+d+ha/ gardza gadza/ ta dzaH/

136b1: bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ b+ha ga ban/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da lI/ mUr+d+han ta TA ya badz+re Na/ sarba big+h+nAn bi nA ya kan/ ni bA ra ya/ ma hA ga Na pa ti dzi bi tA mata/ ka rA ya hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM kro d+ha ga Na pa
136b2: ta ye swA hA/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags dang po'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma shuN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo me hA badz+ra kro d+ha ya da~MSh+To ta ka T+Ta/ b+he ra bA ya/
136b3: si paSh+pa na hastA ya/ he he/ pa ta pa ta/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ kha kha/ khA hi khI hi/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ gardza gardza/ ga Na pa ti dzI bi ta dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya sAhA/
136b4: gsang sngags gnyis pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ bi ma la ka na ka/ dz+wa la b+hu Shi NA ya/ ga ga na a mr-i ta saM b+ha bA ya/
136b5: rak+ta mA l+ya/ a nu le pa na pri yA ya/ badz+ra pA Ni pri yA ya/ badz+ra pa ni tu l+ya/ b+he ga yA/ dai ba/ na ga yak+Sha rak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa pra mAr+tha nA ya/ thi lo kya go tsa rA ya/ sha ta saM n+ya/ pi drA pa ka rA ya/
136b6: dri rat+na ga ra b+ho Na ta mA ya/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da lI/ e h+ye hi daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+he ra bA ga ga na bi d+yud dz+wa la s+phu ling ga sha ni/ tu l+ye ru bo d+hi ti/ si b+hu ta au/ kha kha kha kha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ngan han/
136b7: gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ dza la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ gra sa rba sa/ sarba ba~M g+h+nAn bi nA ya kA nA~M/ hr-id ya~M phaT/ gan d+ha barbeng ya phaT/ rak+Sha rba ya~M phaT/ prab+da rak+Sha sa hr-id ma la/

137a1: sarba dz+wa ra hr-i da yaM phaT/ sarba tsa tur tha ka hr-id yaM phaT/ sarba na kA nAn hr-i da yaM phaT/ hUM hUM phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ A bi sha A bi sha/ i dany+tsa me kAr+yaM ku ru ba dzaH/
137a2: ra a dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ gsang sngags gsum pa'o// na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ daMSh+To ta ka Ta/ b+he ra bA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tiShA tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sA hA/ khro bo bdud
137a3: rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o/ / de nas 'di dag gi snying po don yod pa gang bton pa dang bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrubs na/ bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad gton cing legs par
137a4: bzlas brjod bgyis pa dang bsgrubs par 'gyur pa de bshad par 'tshal lo/ / de la 'di ni bdag gi snying po lags so// oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po'o// rdo rje khro bo
137a5: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis gsang sngags rnams bshad ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ / log 'dren rnams kyang skrag ste/ skyabs med cing rten med par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs
137a6: pa'i thad du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/ zhes de skad du smra zhing mgo thur du
137a7: gtugs so/ / kye kye log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i ngag nyon cig/ rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar bas khyed kyi mgo gshegs sa re/ ngas

137b1: ral pa ser po can rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis lha'i lo stong gi bar du log 'dren rnams bcom pa dang / gtubs pa dang / brdungs pa dang / gzir ba dang / bskams pa gang yin pa de
137b2: dran par gyis shig/ nga'i mthu dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po dran par gyis shig/ gang 'di gsang sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa dang / sgrub pa dang / de srung ba byed
137b3: pa de la glags ma tshol cig/ til sbrus pa 'am zas ngan pa za'ang rung / grong gi chos spyod kyang rung ste/ rig pa thams cad sgrub pa la glags ma tshol cig/ phan za ba'i tshe'ang kham dang po
137b4: sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o/ / nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe lan bdun brjod na de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang ngo // log 'dren rnams kyang glags mi 'tshol lo// til dang / sran chung dag
137b5: 'bras dang / spen tse'ang rung / snum 'khur ba ra pa ta dpal phug kyang rung ste/ thams cad kyang zar zin kyang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin na de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
137b6: yon tan dpag tu med par shes par bya'o/ / 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha b+hu ra ku ku
137b7: Ta rA dza sto tra man+ta/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po sde brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// oM pUr kum hA prA NA ya/ b+hur tsi b+hur kaM mnas/ ur+tha

138a1: swa kro d+ha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swAhU/ phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal bstod// khrol khros pas khro bo che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sngar sangs rgyas// chos su longs su sprul
138a2: pa'i sku/ / sde brtsegs zhes bya ba dag phyag 'tshal// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar dbus na// padz+ra nyiH'i gdan la bzhugs// ljang nag chen po smra ba can// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug
138a3: ste/ / g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ldang ba// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i mche ba 'byin// mi gtsang bdud rtsi sman bzhin gsol// g.yas pa rdo rje ral gri bsnams// g.yon pa zhag
138a4: pa lcags kyu'o/ / tha ma sdigs mdzub thugs kar bsnol// sme gtsang med pa'i las dag brtson// bdug pa sbrul gyis dbu lus brgyan// 'jigs sngangs med par brtul zhugs spyod//
138a5: / khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mau gtsang ba ni gtsang bar mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jigs pa kun las skyob par mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//
138a6: nad dang rims las bsrung bar mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi gtsang zas dang mi gtsang gos// thams cad sel bar byed pa'i mchog/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin gdon//
138a7: thams cad ma lus dga' bar mdzad// nad dang rims dang dal ka yams// bsrung ba'i las mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag la bsrung ba mdzad du gsol// mi gtsang ba rnams gtsang bar

138b1: mdzad/ / sme ba rnams na mo sper mdzad// lci ba rnams ni yang bar mdzad// dog pa yangs par mdzad la bstod// khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs khyod// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlab//
138b2: gang drag khyed la mos rten rnams// lus bde sems bde dbang po bde// bde ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus dag sems dag dbang po dag/ dag pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus
138b3: gtsang sems gtsang dbang po gtsang / / gtsang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus dang sems dang dbang po dang // dang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus gsal sems gsal dbang po gsal
138b4: gsal ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ / lha klu yi dgas 'dre srin sogs// gnod sbyin 'byung pos 'di thos na// sdug bsngal zhi nas bde bar 'gyur// gangs rgyud bzhin du dkar bar 'gyur//
138b5: shel dkar bzhin du gtsang bar 'gyur// me long bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur// nam mkha' bzhin du dang bar 'gyur// sa dang mkha' la 'khod pa yi// lha klu la sogs sde brgyad kun// dge
138b6: pa'i bsam pas 'khod 'gyur te/ / gzhan lam gnod zhi bar mdzod// khro bo'i rgyal po spe brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags so// rgya gar skadadu
138b7: Ar+ya ma hA ba la na ma ma hA yA sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phrag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag

139a1: gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri btang bzung chen po na chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas
139a2: thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ bkur nas mngon par dga' bar byas pa'ang de nyid du 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gis sems can rnams dbugs
139a3: 'byin cing / shar phyogs na me lce kun tu 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs na stobs po che lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa gcig na ni rnga yab thogs
139a4: lag pa gcig gis ni phyag 'tshal/ g.yas pa na ni be con thogs/ g.yon pa na ni zhags pa thogs pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ mig dmar ba'o// de'i 'og na ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
139a5: 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ / g.yas na ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po gnod mdzes so// g.yon na ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro// de nas snying po rnams ni zla ba kham pa lta bur gzhag go// snying po ni
139a6: li ki la dang / 'gro lding ba'o gzungs dang / lus dmar po dang / rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa dang / rdo rje'i rgyan chen te/ snying po'i mchog go// rig sngags kyi rgyal po drag po chen po dang nye ba nan
139a7: 'phags pa mA ma kI'o/ / 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi 'og na rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang rdo rje lu gu chud do// sgo'i nang logs su ni khro bo rdo rje'i tho ba dang rdo rje'i be con gnyis mngon du phyogs par

139b1: gzhag go/ / g.yon logs su ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su ni gos dkar mo'o// de'i 'og tu
139b2: ni sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can no/ / g.yon du rig sngags kyi rgyal po rta mgrin dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong dang ngo // de bzhin du shar phyogs su
139b3: ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / yul 'khor srung dang / dbang po'o// me'i phyogs na ni me'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis bskor ba'o// lho phyogs su ni gshin rje dang khyab 'jug go// bden bral
139b4: phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po ma mos bskor ba'o/ / nub phyogs su ni klu'i bdag po klu la sogs pas bskor ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su ni rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byang phyogs su ni lus
139b5: ngan po 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ / dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni dbang bdag tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / khyab 'jug dang / tshangs pa chen po/ de la sogs
139b6: pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag dang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te snga ma bzhin no// de nas bcom blangs kyis
139b7: bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mdo sde 'di sgrub pa po 'di la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//

143a1: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ bsti stang du byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod par byed na dkyil 'khor thams cad

145a1: oM ma hA pa la/ badz+rad+ha/ ka ra ka ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hU~M laT/ sUt+ma/ oM dz+wa la zas/ su tsu k+Sha mA ka ra rbu/ rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa ban po de dag kyang bsrung ba dang
145a2: yongs su bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ gang gzungs 'di 'chang ba ni dge bar 'gyur/ dug mi gnod par 'gyur/ shi ba
145a3: sos par byed par 'gyur/ dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bu mang bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs kyang 'gas par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//

145a6: bdag po dbang bdag rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po

145b1: stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ lag na rdo rje dka' ba dang / lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / tshangs pa'i dbang pos phyag byas pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po da

145b4: cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis/ 'byung po'i bdag po dbang bdag la 'byung po'i bdag po legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje spar te
145b5: rdo rje la bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo chen po bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms
145b6: par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer 'bar zhing snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang

146a1: 'dzin dang / sems can thamasas kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa

146a3: tshul gyis gnas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas/ rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo 'chol pa lus sbrul gyi ska rags kyis brgyan pa dga' bar byed pa
146a4: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / zhugs ma thag tu khro bo 'chol pas bgegs bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma 'dar te gzir ba bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo // de dag tshig
146a5: nas sme zhing srog btang ste/ sreg pa'i bskal pa snyam du sems shing nyam thag pa'i skad kyis ngus te/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i gan du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs

146b1: chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ / mthu che ba'o// de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ kye ma'o khro bo chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// mthu che ba'o//

150b1: stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir mdo sde'adi bshad par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa bsal ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / rgyas par bya

150b4: lan gsum bskor ba mdzad de/ thal mo sbyar nas legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so zhes mngon par dgyes par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ sangs rgyas de dag

151a1: mu ru/ kaTaM karbe/ dza ye bi dza yaM/ a dzaM te/ a pa rA dzi te/ mar si n+ya tha mdza ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na/
151a2: rdo rje rnam par log 'dren thams cad sdigs shig/ chings shig chings shig/ rnam par choms shig/ ma grub pa rnams grub par gyis shig/ grub pa rnams dul bar gyis shig/ sangs
151a3: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'bab par gyis shig/ lha dang klu thams cad tshur shog tshur shog/ ngas stobs po che khro bo'i mthus dge bar bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
151a4: nur gyur pa stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/

151a6: sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhon nur gyur pa nyon cig/ 'du byed thams cad ni dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni glog dang sprin dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni
151a7: khyim dang dbu ba dang 'dra'o/ / 'du byed thams cad ni mar me dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni chu shing dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams

151b1: cad ni ri mo'i rnam pa dang 'dra'o/ / 'du byed thams cad ni me tog dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni zil ma dang 'dra'o// 'du byed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo dang 'drag
151b2: 'du byed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi klung dang 'dra'o/ / 'khrug par 'gyur bas rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o// skar ma dang 'dra'o// sems can rnams ni 'du byed 'di dag skye bar mi sems//
151b3: mi mthong / mi shes/ mi 'jal gyi/ de bzhin gshegs nyid kyis gzigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'jal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// 'du byed
151b4: thams cad ni stong pa nyid du mtshan nyid gcig par mkhyen to/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan du mkhyen to// stong pa nyid stong
151b5: pa nyid kyi mtshan nyi du mkhyen to/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mtshan nyid 'di nyid
151b6: mthong zhing mtshan nyid 'di shes te/ spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
151b7: bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// mtshan nyid 'di nyid shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag

152a1: pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mdo/
152a2: sde 'di mtshan nyid gang gis na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de bzhin gsheg pa yongs
152a3: su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ / mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di yongs su nub
152a4: pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su nub par 'gyur te/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di 'tsho zhing sdod na de bzhin gshegs
152a5: pa'i bstan pa'ang 'tsho zhing sdod de/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mdo sde 'di nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan nyid
152a6: des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das la rjes su yi rang nas bka' lung bzhin bgyi zhing / su mdo sde 'di
152a7: 'chang ba'i gan du mchi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde'ang nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / u0f7fthams cad k

152b1: yang 'ong ngo / / lha thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// legs so legs so// bdag cag kyang dam pa stsal bar mngon par dga' ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
152b2: cad kyang dam pa'adi nyid stsol ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stobs po che'i gsang ba'i snying po ni sems can thams
152b3: cad la bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshan
152b4: nyid gang gis na mdo sde 'dri chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas zhag sum cu rtsa
152b5: gnyis lon pa'i nyin mor btang bzung chen por mdo sde 'di nyid kyi chos bstan te/ mtshan nyid des na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas
152b6: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas te/ mtshan nyid des na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus lha'i bu grangs med
152b7: dpag tu med pa dag rgyun du zhugs par gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang klog bde la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sras su 'du shes skyed do// 'khor de nyid du 'chi ba'i

153a1: @dus byas nas byang ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par mdzad do/ / lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba bgrod dkar sems can gyi// sring pa'i phung pa 'byin
153a2: cing shes rab kyis/ / srid bur sems krung 'joms shing thub pa yi// chos bstan pas ni sdig 'joms chos legs spyod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje legs par
153a3: rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so/ / lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ su mdo sde 'di 'chang pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pas bsod nams kyi phung po ci
153a4: zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa ni ting nge 'dzin
153a5: bye ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
153a6: rnams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos bsti stang byed par 'gyur ro// bla mar byed par 'gyur ro// rim gror byed par 'gyur ro// mchod par
153a7: byed par 'gyur ro/ / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / bal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyang 'bul lo// byang chub sem dpa' la'ang bde bar sbyar ba sgrub bo// da

153b1: 'dun gyi tshogs la'ang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
153b2: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ / de dag gis chos bstan pa de la'ang bsti stang du byas te nyan to// 'dzin to// klog go// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ji lta
153b3: ba dang mtshungs par stobs kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/ / stobs po che pha rol gnon pa'i khro bo 'di'i mthus bdag dang sems can thams cad/ swasti swa sti/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
153b4: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
153b5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
153b6: dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lag na rdo rje'ang bcom
153b7: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

154a1: gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra shr-i kha lA s+ya tan+ta kalpa/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i rgyud kyi rtog pa/ dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas
154a2: yang dag bshad bya ba/ / dpal bskyed sdug bsngal sel byed cing // sdang ba 'ching tshogs las grol ba'i// cho ga mdzes mas legs par nyon// khrus dang gtsang sbra dang bral zhing // dka' thub
154a3: spyod pa rnams spangs nas/ / drag shul sems kyis gsang sngags 'di// brjod pa tsam gyis myur du 'grub// dad pa brtson 'grus kyis brgyan cing // bag yod snying rje cher ldan pa// des ni bla
154a4: ma mi spong la/ / dpa' brtul shes rab nges pa che// 'gro la byams sems che ba des// sngags dang ting 'dzin phyag rgya tshogs// brtsams pa tsam la dngos grub 'byung // dad med le lo rnam
154a5: 'tshe can/ / bla ma la ni mi gus shing // shes rab zhan cing stobs chung la// bag med gzhan la gnod sems bcas// dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob na// des ni bskal pa stong phrag ni// bye ba du
154a6: mar bsgrubs byas kyang / / 'bras bu yod par mi 'gyur te// dper na byis pa blun po 'gas// 'bras 'dod phub ma brdungs pa la// sha thang chad pa nyid las ni// nam yang 'bras yod mi 'gyur
154a7: ro/ / gsang sngags rgyal po rgyal chen 'di// byin rlabs rnam mang 'byung ba'o// de nas bcom ldan bde chen po// nges par 'grub pa zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// nyid kyi

154b1: sku dang gsung dang thugs/ / rdo rje bla na med pa las// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di phyung ngo // na mo b+ha ga ba t+yaM/ badz+ra shriM kha le/ han ha na/ da ha dang / ts+tshin+da tsun+da/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ khA sa la hiH
154b2: rak+ta ak+ShI badz+ra g+ho Ne/ na mo b+ha ga wa t+yaM/ badz+ra shr-i kha le/ pur+b+ba daM sha/ badz+ra prA ka ra Na ba d+haH/ dik+ta di shan+dar+N+NaHprA kA re Na ban+d+haH/ pash+tsi ma di shany+dza la pra kA re Na ba d+heH/ ut+ta ra di shaM sa ra pra kA re Na ban+d+haH
154b3: ag+na di sha a g+ni prA kA re Na ban+d+haH/ ne r-i ta di sha khar+tha prA kA re Na ban+d+haH/ bA ya byA di shaM bA ta prA kA re Na ban+d+haH/ I shA na di sha tri shU la prA kA re Na pan+naH/ pA tA la di sha nA ga pA sha na ban+d+haH/ U ra d+ha di sha badz+ra shr-i kha lA pra
154b4: kA re Na ban+d+haH/ Ur+N+Na ban+d+haHhUM hUM phaT/ i daM badz+ra shr-i kha lA/ man+te Na da sha daM shaM baM d+haH/ yak+Sha rAk+Sha saM ban+d+haH/ brah+ma rAk+Sha sA daM na baM d+haH/ b+hu ta pra ta pi shA tsa ban+d+haH/ gaM d+harba ban+d+haH/ gaM d+harba ku laM ban+taH/ sa nata ku/
154b5: mAr ban+thaH/ sa na ta ku mA ra b+hu ba na ban+d+haH/ bid+yA d+ha ra ban+d+ha// na gu shra ma NaM ban+d+ha// na gu shra maN daR+sha naM ban+d+haH/ sar+b+ba tIr+thi kaM ban+ta/ sar+b+ba tIr+thi ka daR+sha na ban+d+ha/ saM ha bya g+hA ban+d+ha/ yak+Shi dz+ha ban+d+haH/ rAk+Sha saM bam+b+ha/
154b6: b+hU ti naM ban+d+haH/ bi shA tsaM nI p+san+naH/ gan+d+harbam+ban+naH/ kA mu nA ya nI ban+d+ha// ka Ta DA ki nim+ban+taH/ kin+na raM ban+d+ha/ khe tsa r-ib+dan+naH/ sha ku ni ban+d+haH/ de baM ban+d+haH/ de ba ku la ban+d+ha/ nA ga ban+d+haH/ nA ga ku laM ban+d+ha
154b7: oM su ra bar+d+ha/ / a su ra ku li ban+d+ha/ ga ru Tar+than+taH/ ga ru Ta ku la thAn+d+haH/ bik+Sho ban+d+ha/ paTI ga Na ban+d+ha/ kin+da raM ban+d+ha/ kon+d+ha ra b+hu ba na ban+d+ha/ ma nu Sha ban+d+ha/ mA nu b+hu ba na ban+d+haH/ am ru dza ban+d+ha

155a1: a ma nu/ Shabru ba na ban+d+haH/ tsan+na dit+ya bam+b+ha/ tsan+na dit+ya b+hu ba na ban+d+haH/ sar+b+ba ta bar+d+haH// sar+b+ba ta ta la ban+d+ha// zik+Sha ma ban+d+haH/ brik+Sha ta laM ban+d+haH// sA ku laM ban+d+ha/ pa ra ku laM bstA/
155a2: man kat+yA ba ba d+hA// sam pA da dzAH/ A ni mi ban+d+ha/ ni mat+taM ban+d+haH/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta satwA nAMH/ badz+ra shr-i kha lA/ man+te NA ban+d+ha// kud+d+hi raM ban+d+haH/ ma ka ra su su mA ra bar+t+ta// dza la ban+d+haH/ sA la ban+d+ha// on moH
155a3: gA ba ti badz+ra shr-i kha leH/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ sar+b+ba duSh+TA naM sadz+dza ga pra t+yaM gaM baM d+haH/ dA da sha b+hu dzA yaM/ dA da sha ne tA yaM/ bi kIr+Ni kaM sha yaM/ tsan+d+rA yai/ a ne ka rasmi sha ta/ sa ha srA pra dz+wa li ta dIp+ta te dzA yaM/
155a4: mu gra bi bi d+ha bi Sha d+hA ri ShI/ ur+d+ha ke shA yai/ tsa pa lA yai/ ta thA ga ta/ a pa kA rI sat+kA nA ban+thaH/ i maM badz+ra shr-i kha lA/ man+te Na/ pany+tsa sha ta/ yo dza na pa ri beShI taM badz+ra shr-i kha lI na ban+d+haH/ ba ra mu
155a5: drAts+tshan+da ye na ba li ga le na ban+d+haH/ u grA ya nAM ban+d+haH/ tsa tuR+Sha ki nin+tan+taH/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM hU~M hUM phaT swA hA/ hu lu hu lu/ na ma sh+tsar+t+ta ma hA kro d+haH/ hUM hUM a mr-i ta hUM hUM ban+d+haH/ ad+g+ha shi ti de ba ko TI ni yu ta sha ta
155a6: sa ha srA Ni badz+ra shr-i kha le na ban+d+ha/ tri ko Na pr-i thi bA mUr+t+ti badz+re Na s+pho Ti ya ti swarga mA ta pA tA la bA su ki ta Da ya ti/ bA ta baM d+haH/ me g+haM baM d+haH/ sar+b+ba traM baM d+haH/ ai dza ba d+haH// au dra b+hU ba naM baM d+haH/ ba nasma tiH
155a7: b+haHba na swa ti de baM baM d+haH/ e ka pA daM ban+taH/ dI pA daM ba d+haH/ tri pA da ban+ta/ tsa tuHpA da ben+d+ha/ pany+tsa pA daM ban+ta/ rbA daM ban+ta/ sha ta pA da ban+taHsa ha sra pA daM ban+d+haHlak+Sha pA daM ban+d+haH/ sarba

155b1: bikrAn ban+d+haH/ sar+b+ba bik+ka ku la ban+d+haH/ brah+ma ban+d+ha/ brah+ma b+hu ban ban+d+ha/ biSh+Nu bar+d+ha/ biny+tsa b+hu ba na ban+d+haH/ ma he sha ra ban+d+ha/ ma he shwa ra b+hu ba naM ban+d+ha/ ma hA de baM ban+d+haH/ ma hAde ba dza ta bA ma pA re na bi kra mI Sh+Tha
155b2: oM ni mo b+ha ga ba t+ye badz+ra shr-i kha le da sha di shaM badz+ra prA kA re Na ban+d+haH/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hU~M hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ rig sngags 'di nyid gsungs tsam gyis// rgya chen 'jig rten khams 'di rnams/
155b3: rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur nas// lha dang lha min srin bcas dang // gnod sbyin dri za grul bum dang // mkha' lding lto 'phye lus srul po// klu dang mi 'am ci la sogs// tshogs rnams thams cad myos
155b4: brgyal te/ / sa steng kha bub tu 'gyel nas// dbang po shin tu stor ba la// bde ba chen po'i 'od zer gyis// phog pa'i skad cig de ma thag/ dran pa slar rnyed gzi mdangs skyes// de nas bstod pa'i
155b5: rgyal pos bstod/ / e ma'i bde ba che mchog dpal nyid las// rgyas pa stobs skyes bkra shis kyi// lha mos hUM brjod tsam nyid las// nam mkha'i khams su grags par 'gyur// bde chen ye
155b6: shes mnga' bdag nyid/ / rdo rje zhes pa'i mtshan ldan pa'i// lha mo lu gu rgyud ma la// bdag cag rnams kyis gus par 'dud// sku yi 'od zer sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel byed
155b7: pa'i/ / 'od kyis bdag la bde ba skyes// lha mo bde ba khyod phyag 'tshal// stong nyid smon meng mtshan ma bral// rgyal ba kun gyi rig pa las// ya mtshan lha mo'i rang bzhin thugs// mi rtog rang

156a1: bzhin phyag 'tshal lo/ / de rjes rgyal ba kun 'dus pa'i// gzugs sogs rig pa'i lha mo yis// 'khor lo 'di la legs mchod nas// mgrin gcig tu ni 'dus nas
156a2: su/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi// rdo rje tshig gis bstod par byed// rdo rje nam mkha' las byung ba'i// sangs rgyas thams cad skyes pa'i yum// spos bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin
156a3: gsal/ / rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gzugs kyi sgra yis ni// lha tshogs ma lus rnam 'ching mdzad// bdud rnams tshar gcod rdo rje sgra// nam mkha'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bsngod//
156a4: 'gro drug bdud 'joms zhal drug ma// phyi nang rten 'brel dag phyir phyag/ sgeg cing cung zad 'jigs par byed// rdo rje'i skul phyag 'tshal lo// de skad rdo rje lha mo la// lha la sogs pa thams
156a5: cad kyis/ / rmad byung bstod pa'i rgyal po des// bstod pa'i de ma thag tu ni// lha mo gzi mdangs cher skyes nas// rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra shr-i khA le hUM hUM phaT swA hA/
156a6: rig pa gzungs kyi 'phreng ba'am// gsang sngags 'di nyid bshad tsam gyis// rims dang shu ba g.yan pa dang // lhog pa sha bkra mdze nad 'bras// klad nad mog nang rna nad dang // lkog
156a7: nad glo mtshan nad rnams dang / / rgyu gzer snying nad mkhal nad dang // rkang lag nad dang khyab par na// chu ser nad dang khrag nad dang // bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa dang // shin tu 'khrugs

156b1: pa'i nang la sogs/ / yams nad thams cad zhi bar byed// gzhan yang 'byung po brjed byed dang // sha za mkha' 'gro ma mo dang // gza' dang rgyu skar log 'dren dang // byang sems drag po phyi
156b2: rol gyi/ / rig sngags gtum po la sogs pa// 'jigs pa'i gnod pa thams cad kun// rlung gyis sprin bzhin gtor bar byed// gzhan yang stag gzig dom dred dang // 'phar ba spyang ki gu
156b3: po che/ / sre mong byi ba sbrul byi la// sbrang bu mchu rings pa tre ka/ khA dang se'u byu'u rta la sogs// 'jigs pa rnam mang ji snyed pa// gsang sngags 'di brjod thos tsam gyis// thag rings su
156b4: ni smod par byed/ / gnod pa rnam mang thams cad kyang // sngags kyi sbyor bas sel bar byed// gnod byas rnams ni gnod med byed// gnod med gnod dang ldan byed cing // sbyor ba yang
156b5: ni sbyor ba 'gas/ / gzhan gyi sbyor ba 'ching bar byed// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa las/ gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas 'dir ni bshad bya ba/
156b6: / mdzes ma rdo rje khro mo yi// lha yi ting 'dzin sbyor ba rnams// thig le chen mos mnyan par gyis// oM badz+ra shr-i khA le/ At+ma rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni bsrung ba dang //
156b7: tha mal rtog pa'i lus sbyong byed// snying khar zla ste hUM yig gi/ 'od kyis rigs kyi gtso mo dang // bla ma sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas// mdun du legs par dmigs nas ni// snying kha sa bon

157a1: 'od rtse las/ / me tog sogs 'dzin lha mos mchod// gzugs sogs rdo rje ma rnams kyis// 'dud cing so sor legs par mchod// thog ma med pa'i sring brgyud nas//
157a2: lus ngag yid kyis spyad pa yi// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun// bgyis dang bgyid du stsal ba dang // bgyid la rjes su yi rang ba// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun// thams cad so/
157a3: sor bshags par bgyi// slan chad mi bgyid sdom pa yang // rgya chen bdag gis gzung bar bya// rgyal ba sras bcas mdzad pa dang // 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // rgyal dang byang chub sems
157a4: dpa' dang / / rigs ldan rdo rje lha mo dang // sngags rgyud rgya chen 'khor lo la// kun nas dang bas skyabs su mchi// mi rtog blo gros bskyed pa'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // gdul bya/
157a5: ji srid tshim pa ru// mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba 'debs// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya// gdod nas ji srid da lta yi// bar du lus 'dis cim byas//
157a6: da ni srid pa'i rlung rtogs nas// rang gi lus 'di dbul bar bgyi// thag chen bla na med pa yi// lam chen rgya mtsho gang yin pa// theg chen 'bras bu thob bar du// rgyun mi 'chad par bsten par bya//
157a7: de ltar dang sems 'dun byas te// bsod nams rgya chen rnams bsags pa'i// dge ba bla na med pa des// thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o// dang po byams pa'i 'od zer gyis// 'gro rnams bde

157b1: la dgod par bya/ / gnyis pa snying rje'i 'od zer gyis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal 'bral sems bskyed// gsum pa dga' bas bde ba thob// bzhi pa chags bral btang snyoms so// de rjes rags pa'i
157b2: stobs spong zhing / / ba ga chags dri ma bsal nas kyang // nam mkha' lta bur sgrub byed pa'i// de nas dag pa rjes dran bya// oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+maHswa b+ha ba shud+d+hohaH/ de yis dag par byas
157b3: nas ni/ / stong nyid rjes su bsgom par bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma kohaM/ dngos po thams cad ma lus par// nam mkha' lta bur bsgom par bya// der ni raM skyes nyi dkyil 'khor/
157b4: dmar po 'od zer 'khrigs pa bsgom// de dbus hUM yig sngon po yi// 'od kyis 'gro ba'i bdud bsal te// slar yang yi ge la gzhug par// rdo rje khro mo yongs su rdzogs// zhal gsum phyag
157b5: drug me dpung bzhugs/ / thugs ka ra nyi mar hUM sngon bsam// 'od kyis srung ba'i 'khor lo bya// shar du rdo rje lhor dbyug pa// nub tu chu ste byang du mda'// byang shar rtse gsum shar lho me/
157b6: lho nub ral gri nub byang rlung // 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje brag/ steng phyogs rdo rje rtse lnga'i gur// gsang sngags brjod pas bsgom par bya// hU~M las 'od zer rab spros pas// 'khor lo bkod pa'i
157b7: phyi rol tu/ / rdo rje rtse gsumar ba dang // gur ni rab tu bsgom par bya// de rjes rdo rje khro bo ni// zhu nas rang bzhin med par gyur// de las nyi ma'i steng gnas pa'i// bdud bzhi mnan cing yi zla ni//

158a1: A l-i kA li las byung ba'o// bar du hUM las rdo rje ni// khro mo'i rang bzhin 'od kyis bskor// khro mo dang bcas 'od zer rnams// rdo rje la bzhugs sru bzhengs te// zhal drug
158a2: phyag drug zhabs drug gam/ / yang na zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi mnan// zhal kun sngo zhing khro gnyer can// dmar ser gyen skra thod 'phreng can// rdo rjes lus brgyan nam mkha'i mdog/ bcu gnyis
158a3: phyag ste g.yas pa na/ / rdo rje zhags pa mda' gsor zhing // sbrul dang dgra sta gri gug 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu sdigs mdzub gzhu// dbyig pa rtse gsum tho ba'o// yang na phyag drug g.yas dang
158a4: bos/ / rdo rje gnyis pas lcags sgrog ste// gsum pas mda' ni gsor bar byed// g.yon gyi dang pos sdigs mdzub ste// gnyis pa sbrul zhags 'dzin pa'o// gsum pas gzhu ste 'gengs
158a5: pa'i tshul/ / rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma yi// bsam gtan ting 'dzin la gnas na// yon tan kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// sngags kyi rtsi bar 'gyur pa'o// sngags kyi bdag nyid yongs su bskyed// lha yi
158a6: rang bzhin bsgrub pa yi/ / rin chen gzungs kyi 'phreng bas ni// chos rnams mtha' dag thob 'gyur te// ral gri mig sman ril bu dang // rkang pa byug dang gter chen dang // sa 'og 'gro dang
158a7: bcud len dang / / nam mkhar 'gro dang gser bsgyur dang // de bzhin sa gzhan 'gro ba dang // zhi dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod// rmongs dang rings dang bskrad pa dang // dbye dang dgug dang rig

158b1: sngags 'ching / / srung dang phyir zlog chen po dang // zha dang lkugs dang sems brgyal dang // long dang sna tshogs nad bskyed pa'i// sbyor ba rgya chen 'grub pa dang // mngon shes drug po yongs skye zhing //
158b2: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// phyag rgya chen po thob 'gyur na// ltas mthong tsam la sogs pa yi// dngos grub phra mo smos ci dgos// sngags kyi sbyor ba bskyed pa'i lha// dmigs pa'i rtsa bar gyur
158b3: pa yi/ / hU~M las skyes pa'i lha mo ni// sngon mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma// g.yas pa ser zhing g.yon pa dmar// spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer can// dmar ser gyen skra thod pas brgyan// rus
